\begin{entry}
\word{tAMtirxkapUjA}
\src{saM}
\meaning{\arthanonum{AgamagaLalilx nirUpitavAda iSaTx\-liMgapUjAvidhAna. veVdAdhayxyana mADiruvavaru veVda\-maMtarxgaLa paThaNada mUlaka iSaTxliMgada pUjeyanunx mADa\-bahudu. veVdamaMtarxgaLanunx baLasadiruvavaru hAgU sitxrXVyaru AgamoVkatx
maMtarxgaLanunx paThisuva mUlaka iSaTxliMgada pUjeyanunx mADuvaMtAgali eMba AshayadiMda
AgamagaLalilx tAMtirxka pUjAkarxmavu nirUpitavAgide. pUjA viSayadalilx sitxrXVyarige
matutx puruSarige samAna adhikAra\-vidadxrU sheYva\-bArxhamxNa paraMpareyaMte sitxrXVyarige
veVdAdhi\-kAravilalxveMdu Agama\-gaLu heVLive. I daqSiTxyiMda viVrasheYvadalilx
tAMtirxka pUjAkarxmavu elalxra (sitxrXV-puruSa) swkayaRkAkxgi ide. \hbox{AgamoVkatx}
shivapUjA maMtarxgaLalilx oMdu visheVSavide. iSaTx\-liMgAdi pUjegaLalilx upayoVgisuva
bahaLaSuTx maMtarxgaLa athaR\-gaLu gaMdhadhAraNe modalAda upa\-cAragaLige saMbaMdhisuvudilalx. keVvala
gaMdha muMtAda shabadxparxyoVgadiMda AyA saMbaMdhavanunx kalipxsabeVkAgutatxde. udAharaNege,
gaMdhadhAraNe mADuvAga `gaMdhadAvxrAM\break durAdhaSARmf' eMba veYdika maMtarxvanunx
paThisalAgutatxde. alilx gaMdha shabadxda parxyoVgaveV gaMdhadhAraNege saMkeVta. Adare Agama
maMtarxgaLalilx neraveVrisabeVkAda upacArada athaRvu sapxSaTxvAgirutatxde. AgamoVkatx
maMtarxpaThaNadiMda manasusx AyA kamaRgaLalilx neDutatxde. BakatxvatasxlanAda shivana pUjeyu
athaRgaBiRtavAgi neraveVrutatxde. AdadxriMda tAMtirxka maMtarx\-gaLu iSaTxliMga\-pUjege
utatxmoVtatxmagaLAgive. veVdA\-dhayxyani\-yAda puruSanAgali, sitxrXVyAgali athavA yAvudeV
sitxrXV\-puruSarAgali elalxrigU tAMtirxka maMtarxparxyoVgada adhikAra\-viruvudariMda,
tAMtirxka maMtarxpaThaNadiMda iSaTxliMga\-pUjAdi\-gaLanunx mADuvudu tAMtirxkapUjA
eniside:}}

\begin{shl}

saveRVSAmadhikAroV{\char'263}sitx tAMtirxkeVSu varAnaneV |\\[1pt]

\end{shl}

\begin{entry}
\word{tirxvidha}
\src{va}
\meaning{\artha{mUru bage; mUru parxkAra:} \ullekha{(vacana sAhitayx\-dalilx bahuvAgi baLasiruva I padakekx saMdaBARnu\-sAravAgi aneVka bageya visheVSAthaR\-gaLu barutatxve. avugaLalilx kelavanunx ililx koDalAgide).}
\artha{guru, liMga, jaMgama:}
\ullekha{tanuva koTuTx guruvanolisabeVku manava koTuTx liMgavanolisabeVku dhanava koTuTx jaMgamavanolisabeVku I tirxvidhava horagu mADi ha{\re}ya hoyisi kuruha pUjisuva goravara mecacx (savasaM. 1; basava. 206-52).}
\artha{liMga, jaMgama, parxsAda:}
\ullekha{liMgadalilx kaThiNavuMTe jaMgamadalilx kulavuMTe parxsAdadalilx aruci\-yuMTe I tirxvidhadalilx BAvaBeVdavanarasuvene (savasaM. 1; basava. 286-70); liMga baMdu manavaniMbugoMbudu, jaMgama baMdu dhanavaniMbugoMbudu, parxsAda baMdu tanuvaniMbugoMbudu [I] tirxvidhavu tAne ...niVnolida sharaNaMge daqSaTx (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 57-17).}
\artha{tanu, mana, dhana:}
\ullekha{tanuva koTuTx tanu bayalAyitutx manava koTuTx mana bayalAyitutx dhanava koTuTx dhana bayalAyitutx. I tirxvidhavanu koTuTx\break kUDala\-cenanxsaMgayayxnalilx basavaNaNxMge bayala samAdhi\-yAyitutx (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 1297-457).}
\artha{shudadhx, sidadhx, parxsidadhx parxsAda\-gaLu:}
\ullekha{shudadhxparxsAda guruvinadu, sidadhxparxsAda liMga\-dadu, parxsidadhxparxsAda jaMgamadadu, iMtiV tirxvidha oMdAdavara toV{\rA} (savasaM. 1; basava. 791-201).}
\artha{utapxtitx, sithxti, layagaLeMba mUru avasethx\-gaLu:}
\ullekha{mUjagadalilx ni[ra]taru kUDala\-saMgana sharaNaru tirxvidhava\-nari\-yaru (savasaM. 1; basava. 902-235).}
\artha{manaHsathxla, tanusathxla, karasathxla:}
\ullekha{hara tananx rUpa toVrabeVkeMdu, gururUpAgi baMdu manasathxlakekx maMtarxvAda tanusathxlakekx parxsAdavAda karasathxlakekx liMgavAda iMtiV tirxvidhadalilx sAhitayxvAdanayAyx (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 22-10).}
\artha{tanushudadhx, manashudadhx, BAvashudadhx eMba mUru bageya shudadhxjiVvaru:}
\ullekha{tanushudadhxnAgi iSaTx\-liMgava pUjisabeVku mana\-shudadhx\-nAgi pArxNaliMgava dhAyxnisabeVku BAvashudadhxnAgi BAvaliMgava BAvisabeVku iMtiV tirxvidhavana{\ri}yade... Anu shudadhxnAdeneMba kirxyAdevxYtiyAda pAtakana nAyakanaraka\-dalilxkukxva (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 939-298).}
\artha{kamaRkAMDa, BakitxkAMDa, jAcnxnakAMDa eMba mUru parxkAra\-gaLu:}
\ullekha{kamaRkAMDa BakitxkAMDa jAcnxnakAMDa I tirxvidhadalilx vaMcakanAdaDe Isu vidhadoLage aMgavilalx (savasaM. 1; basava. 889-232).}

\begin{entry}
\word{dashavAyu}
\meaning{\arthanonum{yoVga parxkirxyeyalilx parxmuKavAgiruva pArxNa, apAna, vAyxna, udAna, samAna eMba pArxNavAyu\-gaLu; nAga, kUmaR, kaqkara, deVvadatatx matutx dhanaMjaya eMba upavAyu\-gaLu - I hatutx bageya vAyu\-gaLu deYhika kirxyegaLige sahAyakavAgirutatxve. neVtarxnALadalilxruva pArxNa\-vAyuvu shAvxsoVcACxvXsa kirxyeyanunx; jihAvxnALadalilxruva apAnavu shariVrada kalamxshagaLa visajaRneyanunx; adhamanALa\-dalilxruva vAyxnavu camaRda mUlaka sapxshaRjAcnxnavanunx; kamala\-nALadalilxruva udAnavu ananxrasada sAthxpaneyanunx; muKa\-nALadalilxruva samAnavu ananxrasavanunx haraDuva kAyaRvanunx nivaRhisutatxve. alalxde shorxVtarxnALadalilxruva nAgavAyuvu teVgu, vAMti, udAgxragaLanunx; kaMThanALadalilxruva kUmaRvu kaNuNx mucicx tereyuvudu, nagu, AkaLikegaLanunx; caMdarxnALa\-dalilxruva kaqkaravu pacanakirxyeyanunx; sUyaRnALadalilxruva deVvadatatxvu ELuvudu, kuLitukoLuLxvudu, mAtanADuvu\-danunx hAgU barxhamxnALadalilxruva dhanaMjayavu jAcnxneVMdirxyakekx shabadxvanunx talupisuva kAyaRvanunx mADutatxve:}}
\medskip
\begin{shl}
yeV pashayxMti sadA gwri EteV mAheVshavxrAH samxqqtAH |\\[1pt]
dashavAyUnf tirasakxqqtayx atheV mUdhiRnx parxtiSiThxtAnf ||
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(viV.A.u., BA-1, 1.121, pu. 32)}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\ullekha{ariSaDavxgaR dashavAyu beresipapx kaLaMkavapapx tanuva biDadananxkakx saMsAra mADalalxde sharaNasajajxnike samayAcAra nijavarxtavu durA\-cArigaLigaLavaDadu (savasaM. 1; basava. 856-223); pArxNA\-pAna vAyxnoVdAna samAna nAga kUmaR kaqkara deVvadatatx dhanaMjayaveMba dashavAyugaLa saMcavanaridu ...dhAyxnavane nilisi sucitatx\-dalilx liMgAcaRneya mADuva sharaNa (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 382-120); pArxNa apAna vAyxna udAna samAna nAga kUmaR... karxkara deVvadatatx dhanaMjaya - iMtiV dashavAyu\-gaLu (savasaM. 4; sidadhxrA. 789-222); dashavAyugaLa ni{\ri}si besana koTaTxvarAru shashiravigaLaM usura pathadoLirisidarAru (diVkASxboV. 43-8); dashavAyugaLa ceVSeTxyaM podaRliV\-yadA dashavidhada pAdoVdaka parxsAdakarxmaMgaLana{\ru}pi shiSAyxLige (viVsheYpu. 3-32-2).}}

\begin{entry}
\word{dashavidhakeSxVtarxliMga}

\begin{entry}
\word{dashavidhapAdoVdaka}
\src{va}
\meaning{\arthanonum{gurupAdoVdaka, liMgapAdoVdaka, jaMgamapAdoVdaka, sapxshaRnoVdaka, ava\-dhAnoV\-daka, ApAyxyanoVdaka, hasotxVdaka, pariNA\-moVdaka, ninARmoVdaka matutx satoyxVdaka eMba hatutx bageya pAdatiVthaR: tAtivxka\-daqSiTx matutx kirxyAdaqSiTx eMba eraDu riVtigaLalilx I dashavidhapAdoVdakagaLanunx viMgaDisabahudu.\break tAtivxka\-daqSiTxyalilx sapxshaRna guNadiMda baMdudu guru\-pAdoVdaka, aMgada guNavu nAsitxyAdalilx liMgapAdoVdaka, mahAgaNagaLa arivanunx paDedudu jaMgamapAdoVdaka, catudaRLapadamxvu vikasitavAgalu sapxshaRnoVdaka, liMgakekx parama pariNAmavanunx samapiRsidAga avadhAnoVdaka, liMgAroVgaNe mADidalilx ApAyxyanoVdakavu, liMgavanunx hasatxdalilxDalu hasotxVdaka, shivayoVgavuMTAdAga pariNAmoVdaka, nAmasiVmeyilalxvAdaMdu ninARmoVdaka hAgU shUnayxdalilx beretAga satoyxVdaka eMdAgutatxve. AcaraNeya\break daqSiTxyiMda, pAdagaLige saMbaMdhapaTuTxdu gurupAdoVdaka, A tiVthaRvanunx liMgasaMbaMdha mADuva iceCx\-yuMTAdalilx liMgoVdaka, majajxnakekx eredAga majajxnoVdaka athavA jaMgamapAdoVdaka, jihevxyalilx seVvisidAga sapxshaRnoVdaka,\break adanunx ecacxrikeyiMda seVvisidare avadhAnoVdaka, \hbox{seVvaneya} naMtara taqpitx hoMdidalilx ApAyxyanoVdaka, hasatxda tiVthaRvanunx salilxsidalilx hasotxVdaka, baTaTxla tiVthaRvanunx mUru bAri seVvisidare pariNAmoVdaka, ninARmoVdaka matutx barxhamxraMdharxdalilxruva cidamaqtaveMdeV BAvisuvudu satoyxVdaka eMdenisutatxve:}
\ullekha{parxthamadalilx pAdoVdaka, divxtiVyadalilx liMgoVdaka, taqtiVyadalilx majajxnoVdaka, catuthaRdalilx sapxshaRnoVdaka, paMcamadalilx avadhAnoVdaka, SaSaThxdalilx ApAyxyanoVdaka, sapatxmadalilx hasotxVdaka, aSaTxmadalilx pariNAmoVdaka, navamadalilx ninARmoVdaka, dashamadalilx satoyxVdaka iMtiV dashavidhapAdoVdakava tiLidukoLaLxbalalx kUDala\-cenanxsaMgA nimamx sharaNa (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 1361-482); haLaLx hoLe kere bAvi maDu hoMDa cilume, koLa modalAda sAthxnakekx hoVgi parxthamadalilx ``shivashiva, harahara gurubasavaliMga'' eMba maMtarxdhAyxnadiMda pAdavaniTuTx caraNasoVMkiniM pavitarxvAdudakaveV dhULapAdoVdakavenisuvadayayx. \artha{rAjarige rokakx koDuvudu, yaMtarx maMtarx taMtarxgaLalilx

\begin{entry}
\word{dhAraNayoVga}
\meaning{\arthanonum{= dhAraNa:}
\ullekha{A parashivamUtiRye iSaTxliMga\-veMba BAvaneyiMda aSaTxvidhAcaRne SoVDashoVpacayaRMgaLiMdiSaTxliMgadhAraNadiMda ipupxdu dhAraNayoVga (savasaM. 6; Adayayx. 1141-357); A liMgava BAva, mana, karaNa muKayxvAda savARMgadalilx dharisuvudiVga dhAraNa\-yoVga (savasaM. 11; toVMTasi. 364-170); \hbox{manava} sakaleVMdirxyaM\-gaLa keVrigaLalilx sUsaliVyade dharisikoMDihudeV dhAraNa\-yoVga noVDA aparxmANakUDala\-saMgamadeVvA (savasaM. 13; bAlasaM. 359-164); inunx dhAraNayoVgada lakaSxNa\-veMtene~: saMkalapx vikalApxtamxkavAda manasusx kAkAkiSxyaMte bAhAyxBayxMtara\-gaLige tAneV kAraNavapupxdariMde A manamaM mudArxkaraNa\-baMdhaMgaLiMdaMtamuRKamaM mADi, anavaciCxnanx teYladhAreyaMte shiva\-dhAyxnamaM mADutiralu A dhAyxnAkAradiM karigoMDa vasutx\-vinoLu A manavu nishacxlamAgaladeV dhAraNa\-yoVga noVDA aKaMDeVshavxrA (savasaM. 14; SaNumxKa. 737-332); dhAyxnisidalilx AyA liMga\-gaLu AyA cakarxgaLalilx sAthxpayxvAguvuvu. idariMda BAva, karaNa, mana muKayxvAda savARMgadalilx A liMgavu toLagi beLagahatatxlu A liMgadoDane AcaraNe\-gaLuMTAguvuvu. ideV dhAraNayoVgavu (shivAkoV. 48-44).}}
\vskip 5pt
\newmeaning{\ni{dhAraNasayx yoVgaH - dhAraNayoVgaH}}
\end{entry}

%AcAraliMgava aMgeYyoLagaLavaDisi... jAgarxtf savxpanxdalilx pUjisuva dhAraNayoVgadoLiduR... (savasaM. 11; GanaliM. 727-338);

I parxkAra mADi avaru avugaLanunx kelavoMdu sathxLakekx saMbaMdhisutAtxre... udA: manuSayxnalilx sUthxla, sUkaSxmX, kAraNa shariVragaLive. avugaLiganusarisi modalu mUru sathxla, AmeVle Aru sathxla\-gaLu nimiRsalapxTiTxve" (shivAkoV. 11-17).}}

\newmeaning{\ni{navaguNAnAM sathxlaM - navaguNasathxlaM}}

 niVDu, sAmarasayx sithxtiyanunx koDu' eMdu shivananunx keVLadidadxrU,
 shivaneV A nirupAdhika \hbox{Bakitxge} mecicx `atishaya padava\-niVvanu':}
\ullekha{naranoLagAgi narapatiya seVveya mADuvalilx, nirupAdhikaseVveyiMda atishaya padavaniVvanu (savasaM. 9; saMapapx. 284-90).}}

\begin{entry}

\begin{entry}

\begin{entry}
\word{nirupAdhiBakatx}
\src{koV}
\meaning{\arthanonum{liMgadhArakaBakatx, upAdhiBakatx matutx nirupAdhiBakatx eMba tirxvidha Bakatxralilx obabx; kirxyAdiVkeSxyanunx hoMdi, tananx savaRsavxvanUnx guru liMga jaMgamakekx samapiRsuvavanu; nirApAdhiBakatxru mUdhinxR (netitx), lalATa (haNe), eraDu kivi\-gaLu, eraDu kaNuNx\-gaLu, GArxNa, muKa, eraDu bAhu\-gaLu, eraDu pAshavxR\-gaLu, nABi (okakxLu), meVDharx (jananAMga), pAyu (benunx), paqSaThx (guda), Urudavxya (toDe), eraDu maMDi\-gaLu, eraDu teMDe(tatitx)gaLu matutx eraDu pAda\-gaLu - eMbudAgi deVhada mUvatetxraDu sathxLagaLalilx viBUtidhAraNa mADuvaru:}
\ullekha{ayAyx shirxVviBUtiya dharisuva BeVdaveMteMdaDe : sahaja liMgadhArakaru eMTu sAthxnadalilx dharisuvudayAyx ...maMtarxdiVkeSxyukatxrAda nirupAdhi Bakatxru mUvatetxraDu sAthxnadalilx dharisuvudayAyx (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 931-295); nirupAdhiBakatxnu kirxyAdiVkeSxyanunx hoMduvudalalxde guruliMgajaMgamadalilx tananxdelalxvanUnx nivaRMcakatavxdiMda samapiRsi naDenuDi saMpananxnAgirutAtxne. Itanige liMgamaMtarx\-vanunx heVLuvudu (\hbox{shivAkoV.} 116-260).}}

\begin{entry}
\word{nirUpaliMga}
\meaning{\arthanonum{EkoVtatxra jaMgamaliMgasathxladalilxruva olavuliMga, nirUpaliMga, parxsAdaliMga matutx pAdoVdakaliMga eMba nAlukx sathxlagaLalilx oMdu:}

\begin{entry}

\begin{entry}

(savasaM. 5; niVlamamx. 1063-315); rUpu nirUpuviDidAcarisi tanu manava bayala mADabalalxDe sharaNa. (savasaM. 11; toVMTasi. 297-141);

\begin{entry}

(savasaM. 2; alalxma. 1573-467); deVva, kirxV miVridudAgi saguNa niguRNavAda, sAkAra nirAkAravAda (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 1545-562); ayAyx, sadAcAra sadaBxkitx satikxrXyA samayxkfjAcnxna sadavxtaRne saguNa \hbox{niguRNa} nijaguNa sacacxritarx sadABxva akorxVdha satayxvacana... tirxvidha \hbox{SaDivxdha} navavidha liMgApaRNa (savasaM. 5; akakxma. 37-15); iMtapapx nirupAdhika Bakatxna, niguRNa caritarxvaneVneMbenayAyx, mahAliMgaguru shivasidedhxVshavxra parxBuveV (savasaM. 11; toVMTasi. 510-233); tirxguNavaMtaHkaraNacatuSaTxyaMgaLaM saguNa \hbox{niguRNa} muKayxvAda viSayaMgaLaM sUthxlasUkaSxmXM kAraNAdiya tanutarxyaM shUliyalalxde mALapxruMTe (diVkASxboV. 43-11); sakala sakalaniSakxla niSakxlaveMba mU{\ru} tatAtxvXtamxkatavxdiM sUcitamAda saguNa niguRNaveMberaDu vasutxvina sAkASxtAkxramAdoDe ...moVkASxpeVkeSxyuLaLxvageR shivayoVgasaMpananxnAda sadugxruveV\break pUjisalu yoVgayxnu (pArake. 270).}
\artha{shAshavxtavAda mukitx\-saMpAdanegAgi mADuva nirAkAra barxhomxVpAsane; niviRkalapx samAdhi:}
\ullekha{shivadhAyxnavu saguNaveMdu niguRNaveMderaDu parxkAravu (pArake. 270); yama niyama Asana pArxNAyAma parxtAyxhAra dhAyxna dhAraNa samAdhigaLeMba saguNaniguRNarUpavAda aSATxMgayoVgavidhi\-gaLuM (viveVka. 129).}}

\ullekha{paMcapaMcA\-kaSxriya GanapaMcakalashadoLu madhayxkalashake mUlavenipa paMcAkaSxriyanucacxrisi saMsakxrisi (viVsheYpu. 7-105-42); {\bf paMcakaLasha.} I paMcakaLashaMgaLaM viracisutatxlA shirxV paramagurumUtiRyadhika kaLashAcAyaRreV pariyenalekx pAdAcaRnege yoVgayxdupadeVshakataRM nAlavxra A pUvaR\-vilasitAcAyaRreMdeV samxrisutoVpasAdAKayxnAmadinaMta\-vagaRLaM sAthxpanaM mADi (viVsheYpu. 7-103-60); uragabaMdhA\-kAradiMdalilx taMtu swMdaradiMda paMcakaLashaMgaLoLagaM kUtuR gurukaLashamuKayxkekx paMcapaMcakataMtuviMda pari\-veVSiTxsuvudu (viVsheYpu. 7-105-35).}}

\ullekha{paqthivx IgaleV \hbox{Bakatx} apupx IgaleV maheVshavxra aginx IgaleV parxsAdi vAyu IgaleV pArxNaliMgi AkAsha IgaleV sharaNa I paMcatatatxvXda oLage beLaku katatxle aikayxvu (savasaM. 3; cananxba. 962-307); paqthivx apupx teVja vAyu AkAshaveMba paMcatatatxvXda madhayxdalilx pudidipapx Atamxna oDeyananarivAga paqthivx\break paqthivxya kUDitutx ...AkAsha AkAshava kUDitutx A paMcatatatxvXvu\break oMdaroLagoMdu kUDidalilx Atamxna pApa puNayxvAvudu (savasaM. 9; shAMtara. 27-11); paMcatatatxvXgaLa paMcakalashagaLa hUDi paMcAkaSxrimaMtarx kiviyoLage Udi (kUDasavx. 28-4); paMcatatatxvXyukatxvAda deVhavane Asharxyava mADikoMDu Atamxnu honunx heNuNx maNaNxne bayasutatx ...Bavakekx IDAgi keTaTxru kelabaru (liMgaliV. 314-17).}

\meaning{\artha{barxhamxhateyx, surApAna, savxNaRsetxVya, gurupatinxVgamana matutx iMtha pApakAyaR\-gaLanunx mADidavara sahavAsa eMba aidu bageya \hbox{doDaDx} pApakAyaR\-gaLu:}
\ullekha{kariyaMjuvudu aMkushakakxyAyx ...paMca\-mahApAtakavaMjuvudu kUDala\-saMgana nAmakakxyAyx (savasaM. 1; basava. 75-22); paMcamahApAtakaM\-gaLu hoVha ThAva kaMDe. savaRduHKa\-gaLu beVva ThAva kaMDe (savasaM. 2; alalxma. 1338-394).}
\artha{guru, liMga, jaMgama, AcAra, parxsAdagaLige dorxVha mADuvaMtha aidu bageya pApakaqtayx\-gaLu:}
\ullekha{gurukAruNayxva haDeda Bakatxnu hiMdaNa pUvARsharxyava berasidaDe gurudorxVha liMgadorxVha jaMgamadorxVha AcAradorxVha parxsAdadorxVha iMtiV paMcamahApAtakaM\-gaLu\break BakatxMgalalxde Bavigelilxyado (savasaM. 1; basava. 768-195).}
\artha{aMgada meVle parxtiSAThxpisida liMgavanunx tegedu\-hAku\-vudu, diVkeSx paDeyadavariMda AhAravanunx sivxVkarisuvudu,\break parxtimegaLanunx pUjisuvudu, parxsAdasaMbaMdhavanunx tiLiya\-diruvudu, pArxNa\-vanunx liMgadalilx nelegoLisadiruvudu eMba\break aidu bageya hiVna kAyaR\-gaLu:}
\ullekha{aMgada meVle liMga\-parxtiSeThxyane mADi hiMgidaDe parxthama pAtaka BavipAkakekxLasidaDe\-raDaneya pAtaka, parxtumAdigaLige{\ra}gidaDe mU{\ra}neya pAtaka,\break parxsAdasathxlavana{\ri}yadidadxDe nAlakxneya pAtaka, suLuhaDagi liMga\-liVyava mADadidadxDe aidaneya pAtaka, iMtiV paMcamahApAtakava kaLeyabalalxDe tiLiyabeVku ...nimamx sharaNanAgabalalxDe (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 181-53).}
\artha{meVlakxMDa aidu bageya mahApApa\-kAyaRgaLanunx mADida vayxkitx:}
\ullekha{aMgada meVlaNa liMgava hiMgi sAthxvaraliMgakekxraguva BaMgitara muKava noVDalAgadu ...aMtapapx paMcamahApAtakara muKadatatx toVradirA (savasaM. 2; alalxma. 704-193); guruvinalilx upadeVsha paDedu parxsAdakekx sUtakava mADuva paMcamahApAtakaru niVvu keVLi BoV (savasaM. 8; maDimA. 574-216).}}
%\arthanonum{shivasharaNaru niSidadhxvAda aneVka bageya AcaraNegaLanunx paMcamahApAtakagaLeMdu ulelxVKisidAdxre. avugaLalilx kelavanunx meVle sUcisalAgide.}}
\vskip 7pt
\newmeaning{\ni{mahAMti ca tAni pAtakAni ca mahApAtakAni paMca ca tAni mahApAtakAni ca - paMcamahApAtakAni}}
\end{entry}

\ullekha{Atamxshudidhx\break sAthxna\-shudidhx darxvayxshudidhx liMgashudidhx maMtarxshudidhxyeMba paMcashudidhx\-gaLaM visatxrisuvada{\ra}lilx shwcAcamana sAnxna Basamx rudArxkaSx\-dhAraNa kavaca maMtarx kalAnAyxsa dhAyxnAdi racanaMgeYvudeV Atamxshudidhxyenisuvudu samAmxjaRnAnuleVpana vaNaRka gaMdha puSapx dhUpa diVpAdi nimaRloVpakaraNaMgaLiM cwkamanalaMkaripudeV sAthxna\-shudidhxyenisuvudu jalagaMdhAkaSxte puSApxdigaLaM niriVkiSxsi Basamx maMtarxvArigaLiM saMporxVkaSxNaMgeYvudeV darxvayxshudidhxyenisuvudu\break anAmike madhayxmegaLa madhayxdalilx naviVnakusumaviDidu aMguSaThx\-tajaRnigaLiM modala nimARlayxmaM tayxjisi liMgapiVThamaM vAriyiM parxkASxlanaMgeYvudeV liMgashudidhxyenisuvudu sakala\-pUjAthaRmAgi OM namaH shivAya sAvxhA eMducacxripudeV maMtarxshudidhxyahudu (viveVka. 93).}}

\ullekha{``liMgapiVTha\-gaLu samavAgi paMcasUtarx parxmANavu AgamoVkatxdaMte shudadhxvAdare\break AyureYshavxyaR\-gaLuMTAguvuvu... liMgavaM baLasida sUtarx\break parxmANaveV 1. liMgapiVThavaM aLeyuvudu, 2. liMgoVnanxta\break piVThaparxmANa, 3. goVmuKada agarxliMga masatxkaparxmANa, 4. adaradhaRveV goVmuKavu, 5. hiVge paMcasUtarx\-gaLu shivA\-gamadathaRvu (viVsheYpu. 7neya kAMDa, tAtapxyaRcaMdirxke. puTa 30); iMtu paMcasUtarxmuLaLx piVTha\-liMga\-doLeMdeV jAtishilAdigaLAda kAMtimayavapapx liMga\-sathxlamaM tiVthARMbu paMcagavayx Basita mishorxVdakaMgaLiM paripUtamAda tirxvidha kuMBadoLf...\break avagAhamirisi (viveVka. 101); A paMcasUtarxda vidhAna\-veMtene mahA shirxV paramaliMgamaM baLa\-sidaR sUtarxveV tA pavaNadoMdu sUtarxM liMgapiVThavaLeyalekxraDu liMgoVnanxtaM A piVThadeDeyoLeV mU{\ru} goVmuKadagarx Opa liMgada masatxkakekx nAlakxda{\ra}dhaRveV parikisalekx goVmuKaviMtu paMcasUtarxM shivAgamadathaRveY (viVsheYpu. 7-105-47).} \artha{diVkASxvidhi \hbox{muMtAda} maMgaLakAyaRgaLigAgi sAthxpisuva paMcakalashagaLalilxya gurukalashakekx, maMtarxdhAyxnasahitavAgi uragabaMdha\-daMte saMbaMdhi\-suva aidu eLe\-gaLu:} \ullekha{saMcadoVvariyoLage paMca\-sUtarxvu miMci kaMcu\-miMcina saMcalana nuMgitu paMca\-sUtarxvu miMci saMcadoVvarigoMDu paMcamuKa parama\-guruvAda sharaNa (padagoV. {\rm v-}2); I maMtarxdiMda gurukalashakekx paMca\-sUtarxMgaLanikikx paMcapalalxvaMgaLanikikx paMcamuKaMgaLanikikx guru\-kalashavaM sAthxpayxvaM mADuvudu (gaNaBA. 189-21).}}

(savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 975-315); siVme saMbaMdhagaLa miVripapx maMtarxkekx, shiVla saMbaMdhadoLagu horagu tirxvidha saMpUNaRvAda kAraNa nitayxpAdoVdakavenisitutx (savasaM. 4; sidadhxrA. 1303-376); Adi anAdi nitAyxnitayxva tiLiyalariyade... \begin{entry}
\word{paramAtamx}
\meaning{\artha{jagatitxnalilx savaRvAyxpiyAgiruva \hbox{ceYtanayx}; parashiva:}
\ullekha{shudAdhxtamx paramAtamxribabxrU oMdu ratanxkekx heNagATa\-vanADiharu. avara heNagATava noVDi A ratanxva seLedukoMDaDe kUDala\-saMgamadeVvaMgAroVgaNeyAyitutx (savasaM. 1; basava.\break 906-236); shirxVguru koTaTx liMgava biTuTx beVre matetx AtamxtatatxvXva vicArisi noVDabeVkeMdu paramAtamxnalilx yoVgava mADi yoVgigaLAgi mukatxrAdeveMbiri (savasaM. 6; uripe. 1279-404); ``AtamxneV barxhamx\-veMdu heVLuvaMtha veVdAMtiyu'' (basaTiV. {\rm\em{II}}, 254-907 TiVku); paramAtamx parameVshavxra ...nirUpa citetxYsu\break (basapu. 60-45).}
\artha{jiVvAtamx, aMtarAtamx matutx \hbox{paramAtamx} eMba AtamxtarxyagaLalilx oMdu; aMtarAtamxnigiMta ucacxsAthxnavanunx paDediruva paramAtamxnu kAraNashariVriyAgi, liMga\-sithxti\-yanunx paDedanaMtara shariVrada savARMgagaLalilxyU ceYtanayx\-vanunxMTumADutAtxne. kAraNashariVradoMdige saMbaMdhi\-sida BAvaliMgavu parxkaTagoMDu Atamxnu suSupitxyalilx\break shivanalilx aikayxvanunx hoMdutAtxne:}
\ullekha{jiVvAtamx aMtarAtamx paramAtamxreMdAtamxtarxyaMgaLavaralilx ...loVkavayxvahArakekx sUyaR\-neMtaMte jiVvAMtarAtamxra vayxvahArasAkiSxkaneV paramAtamxnapapxM (viveVka. 25); AtamxM mU{\ru} BeVdaM ...jiVvAtamxnaMtarAtamxM\break baLika paramAtamxM ...tatapxrXpaMcadoLf barade silakxde nirAkAra\-rUpinoLihaM paramAtamxM (cebapu. 58-31).}
\artha{jaMgama\-liMgasathxladalilxruva olavuliMgada mUru sathxlagaLalilx\break oMdu; viveVka\-savxrUpiyAda pArxNaliMgiyanunx \hbox{paramAtamxnu} Avarisuva sathxla:} \ullekha{olavu liMga\-tirxvidha: jiVvAtamx aMtarAtamx paramAtamx (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 839-246).} 
\artha{Atamxna vikAsakakxnusAravAgi uMTAguva \hbox{jiVvAtamx}, aMtarAtamx, paramAtamx, nimaRlAtamx, shudAdhxtamx, \hbox{jAcnxnAtamx}, mahAtamx, divAyxtamx matutx cinamxyAtamx eMba oMbatutx avasethxgaLalilx\break oMdu:}
\ullekha{vikAsa hoMdida hAge Atamxnu anu\-karxma\-vAgi \hbox{jiVvAtamx}, aMtarAtamx, paramAtamx ...divAyxtamx matutx cinamxyAtamx eMdu heVLalapxDutAtxne (shivAkoV. 25-38).}
\artha{\hbox{mUvatAtxru} bageya tatatxvXgaLalilx oMdu:}
\ullekha{CatitxVsa tatatxvXdoLu rAjisututxviRyoLagaNuvigaNuvA mahatitxge mahatitxVvaRrilelxnisuvadavxyarUpaniravanAM baNiNxsuvoDaLave ...enanx mana oMdipupxdipapxtAtxrenisuvaMtarAtamxnoLalA ipapxtatx ELaneya paramAtamxnoLu nimamx manavipupxdayayx (viVsheYpu. 3-38-33).}}
\vskip 5pt
\newmeaning{\ni{paramashacx asw AtAmx ca - paramAtAmx}}
\end{entry}

Atana jiVva BAvavaLidu paramAtamxnenisidalilx... (savasaM. 2; alalxma. 944-284); jaladalilx huTiTxda kesaru kiSxVradalilx toLedare hoVhude?... jiVvAtAmx paramAtAmx ceVnumxkAtxnAM paramA gatiH... riVti rasagaMdha, itAyxdigaLanunx Bakatxnu anuBavisuva modaleV
parashivanu anuBavisutAtxne.}}

 shudadhxnAgutAtxne. shivaniMda baMdudelalxvanUnx shivanigapiRsi
 parxsAda\-vanAnxgi mADikoMDu, anaMtaraveV adanunx sivxVkarisa\-beVkAdudu
Bakatxna nitayx matutx Adayx kataRvayx. parxthamadalilx AhArapAniVyagaLaSeTxV apiRsuva Bakatxnu tananx jAcnxna vaqdidhxyAdaMtelalx\break
tananx deVheVMdirxyAdigaLanUnx modalu shivanigapiRsi,\break anaMtara
avugaLanunx upayoVgisutAtxne athavA avugaLa mUlaka
anuBavisutAtxne. oMdathaRdalilx iDiV kAyaveV parashivanadu eMdu
tiLiyabeVkAdudu Bakatxna AdhAyxtimxka kataRvayx\-vAgutatxde. aMthavana
kAyaveV parxsAdakAya. parxsAda heVge shudadhxvoV, hAgeyeV parxsAdakAyavU shudadhx:} \ullekha{paMca\-BUtakAyava BaviyeMdenisaliVyade parxsAdakAyava mADi salahuva namamxyayx (savasaM. 1; basava. 789-200); sajajxnike\-yuLaLxDe parxsAdakAya keDuvude? (savasaM. 2; alalxma. 255-76); I paMcaBUta kAyava parxsAdakAyaveMba hesariTuTxkoMDu nuDiva pAtakara nuDiya koLalAgadu (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 233-76); kAma korxVdhava niVgi, loVBa moVha mada matasxrava CeVdisi, Ase roVSavaLidu, jagada pAshava biTuTx marugisuva kAyavane parxsAdakAyava mADi salahidaru (savasaM. 5; haDaliM. 1244-378); pArxNakekx ariva toVri parxsAda\-kAyava mADidare, AtaneV diVkASxguruveMbe (savasaM. 9; apapxNaNx. 964-296).}}

\meaning{\arthanonum{liMgavu iSaTxliMga, pArxNaliMga, BAva\-liMgaveMdu mUru bage. avu karxmavAgi matetx eraDera\-DAgi AcAraliMga, guru\-liMga, shivaliMga, jaMgamaliMga, parxsAdaliMga matutx mahA\-liMga eMba SaDivxdhaliMgagaLAgutatxve, I Aru liMgagaLu karxmavAgi BakAtxdi SaTfsathxlagaLige saMbaMdhisidudx.\break sharaNa\-sathxlakekx saMbaMdhapaTaTx parxsAdaliMgavu parashivana IshAna\-muKavanunx parxtinidhisutatxde. BAvaliMgada parxsAdaliMga,\break mahAliMga eMba eraDu BeVdagaLalilx oMdu \hbox{paramAtamxna} IshAnamuKada savxrUpavuLaLx liMga. idara savxrUpa aidu: joyxVtirUpa, shAshavxta, aKaMDa, iMdirxyAdigaLige goVcarisade jAcnxnakekx mAtarx goVcaravAguva, amaqtasavxrUpa, samasatx parxpaMcada pariNAmakekx kAraNavU, upAdhirahitavU Ada sAdAKayxtatatxvXdiMda udaBxvisida parAshakitxyiMdoDagUDiruva liMga. liMganiSeThx\-yuLaLxvanu SaTacxkarxgaLa mUlaka tananx deVhadalilx hariyuva shakitxgaLanunx liMgamuKavanAnxgi mADidAga parxsAdaliMgavu vishudidhxcakarxdalilx nelegoLuLxtatxde. ivu sadAshivanige saMbaMdhapaTiTxde. manuSayxnalilxruva citatx, budidhx, ahaMkAra, manasusx, jAcnxna matutx BAvagaLa mUlaka kirxye\-gaLu naDeyutatxve. ivugaLalilx jAcnxnavu\break parxsAdaliMgakekx saMbaMdhiside. parxsAdaliMgada parxdhAnalakaSxNa\-veMdare AnaMda. beVrebeVreya sathxlagaLige parxsAdaliMgavu\break saMbaMdhapaTATxga alilx aneVka bageya AnaMdavanunxMTu mADutatxde:}}
%parxsAdaliMgadalilx niSapxtitxliMga, AkAshaliMga, parxkAshaliMga eMba mUru parxmuKa viBAgagaLidudx, avugaLalilx kirxyAniSapxtitx, BAvaniSapxtitx, jAcnxnaniSapxtitx; piMDA\-kAsha, biMdAvxkAsha, mahadAkAsha; kirxyAparxkAsha, BAvaparxkAsha matutx jAcnxnaparxkAsha eMba oMbatutx parxkAragaLive. 
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
BAvAdiliMgatirxtayaM divxvidhaM divxvidhaM BaveVtf |\\[2pt]
BAvaliMgaM mahAliMgaparxsAdABiKayxkaM davxyamf |\\[2pt]
parxsAdaliMgaM kathitamf IshAnamuKasaMjacnxkamf ||\\[-1pt]
\end{shl}
\smallskip
\pauthor{(caM.A., kirx.pA., 3. 26)}
\medskip
\begin{shl}
EkameVkasathxlaM BUyoV divxvidhaM divxvidhaM BaveVtf |\\[2pt]
mahAliMgaM parxsAdAKayxM liMgamituyxBayasathxlamf |\\[2pt]
BAvaliMgaM BavateyxVva sAvxnuBUtiparxmANataH ||\\[2pt]
parxsAdaliMgasaMyukatxmaMgaM hi sharaNasathxlamf ||\\[-1pt]
\end{shl}
\smallskip
\pauthor{(a.sU., 3. 16, 18; 5. 80)}
\medskip
\begin{shl}

jAcnxnoVpalabadhxmamaqtaM pariNAmabiVjamf |\\[2pt]
sAdAKayxtatatxvXmuditaM parayA savxshakAtxyX\\[2pt]
pArxhuH parxsAdaGanaliMgamupAdhihiVnamf ||\\[-1pt]
\end{shl}
\smallskip
\pauthor{(a.sU., 5.29)}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\ullekha{jaMgamaliMgaviDidu parxsAdaliMgava kANabeVku (savasaM. 2; alalxma. 867-254); AcAraliMga guruliMga shivaliMga jaMgamaliMga parxsAdaliMga mahA\-liMga I Aru liMgasathxla\-gaLu (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 966-308); parxsAdaliMga saMbaMdha\-vAda baLika, ApAyxyavanariyabeVku (savasaM. 4; sidadhxrA.\break 791-223); parxsAdaliMgada beLagenanx AkAshatatatxvXdalilx thaLathaLi\-sutitxhudu (savasaM. 12; deVshikeVM. 156-46); shorxVtarxdalilx parxsAdaliMga haqdaya\-dalilx mahAliMga ...parxsAda\-liMgada{\ri}vu shabadx mahAliMga\-da{\ri}vu saveRVMdirxya (mishArxpaR. 677-17).}}
\vskip 5pt
\newmeaning{\ni{parxsAdaH Eva liMgaM - parxsAdaliMgaM}}
\vskip 3pt
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\SEE{parxsAdaliMgasathxla}}}
\end{entry}

\begin{entry}

\artha{shudadhx, sidadhx matutx parxsidadhx eMba mUru bageya parxsAda\-gaLu:}
\ullekha{shudadhx sidadhx parxsidAdhxKayx : sa hi muketxtxYkasAdhanaH | (caM.A.kirx.pArx., 5.21); shudadhx sidadhx parxsidadhxveMdu parxsAdaliMgatirxvidhavava{\ra}lilx guru\-BukatxsheVSaveV shudadhxvenisuvudu liMgaBukatxsheVSaveV sidadhxvenisuvudu jaMgamaBukatx\-sheVSaveV parxsidadhxvenisuvudu (viveVka. 112).}}

\begin{entry}

\meaning{\arthanonum{sharaNasathxlakekx saMbaMdhisida liMgasathxla. I sathxladalilx diVkASxpAdoVdaka, shikASxpAdoVdaka, jAcnxnapAdoVdaka, kirxyAniSapxtitx, BAvaniSapxtitx, jAcnxnaniSapxtitx, piMDAkAsha, biMdAvx\-kAsha, mahAkAsha, kirxyAparxkAshana, BAvaparxkAsha, jAcnxna\-parxkAsha eMba hanenxraDu avAMtarasathxlagaLive:}}

mahAkAshasathxlaM cAtha kirxyAyAshacx parxkAshanamf |\\[2pt]
BAvaparxkAshanaM pashAcxtf tatoV jAcnxnaparxkAshanamf ||\\[-1pt]

\meaning{\artha{parxsAdisathxlakekx saMbaMdhisida apiRta\-parxsAdi, avadhAnaparxsAdi matutx pariNAmaparxsAdi eMba tirxvidha parxsAdi\-gaLu; iSaTxliMgakekx sakalavanUnx apiRsuva apiRta\-parxsAdi, paMceVMdirxyagaLalilx paMcaliMgagaLanunx nele\-goLisi liMgAnuBavavanunx paDeyuva avadhAnaparxsAdi, \hbox{savARMgavU} liMgatanuvAgi liMgaBoVgoVpayoVgi\-yAguva pariNAmaparxsAdi eMba mUru parxkArada parxsAdi\-gaLu:}
\ullekha{parxsAdisathxlatirxvidha: apiRtaparxsAdi avadhAnaparxsAdi\break pariNAmaparxsAdi adakekx vivara: kAyada keYyalilx sakalapadAthaRM\-gaLa iSaTxliMgakekx koTuTx koMba\-nAgi avadhAnaparxsAdi. paMceVMdirxyaM\-gaLalilx paMcaliMga \hbox{parxtiSeThxya} mADi alalxlilx baMda suKavanalalxlilx manada keYyalilx koTuTx koMbanAgi\break avadhAnaparxsAdi. aMgAsharxyavaLidu liMgAsharxyavuLidu BAva\-BaritanAgipapxnAgi pariNAmaparxsAdi (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 720-217).}
\artha{liMgApiRtavAda padAthaR\-gaLanunx mAtarx seVvisuva padAthaRparxsAdiyu, parxsAdavu tananxlilx nele\-goMDiruva ApAyxyanaparxsAdi, elalxvanUnx samanAgi kANuva\break samatA\-parxsAdi eMba tirxvidhaparxsAdi\-gaLu:}
\ullekha{parxsAdisathxlatirxvidha: padAthaR\-parxsAdi ApAyxyanaparxsAdi samatAparxsAdi (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 279-224).}}

\word{pArxNaliMga}
\meaning{\artha{iSaTxliMga, pArxNaliMga, BAvaliMga eMba mahAliMgada mUru vidhagaLalilx oMdu. manasisxniMda garxhisa\-lAguva sakalaniSakxlaliMga. idakekx sUkaSxmXliMga eMba hesarU parxsidadhxvAgidudx sUkaSxmXshariVradalilx dharisu\-vaMtahadudx. sUkaSxmX\-shariVradalilx guruviniMda nelegoMDa liMga\-tatatxvX; guruvu iSaTxliMgadalilx cicaCxkitxyanunx AvAhanemADi tananx shiSayxnige anugarxhisida liMga; iMdirxyagaLige ceYtanayx\-savxrUpavAda pArxNa\-dalilxyeV pArxNaliMgavu nelegoLuLxvudariMda deVhaguNa\-gaLu aLidu, liMgaguNa\-gaLu aLavaDuvuvu:}}

taqtiVyamiSaTxliMgaM sAyxditeyxVvaM tirxvidhaM matamf |\\[2pt]
pArxNaliMgaM manoVgArxhayxM BaveVtf sakalaniSakxlamf ||\\[-1pt]
\end{shl}

\medskip

\smallskip
\newmeaning{\ullekha{pArxNaliMga parxtigArxhakanAda baLika liMgavirahitanAgi naDeva pariyeMto (savasaM. 1; basava. 797-205); pArxNa\break\-liMgakekx kAyave sejejx AkAshagaMgeyalilx majajxna hUvilalxda parimaLada pUje! haqdayakamaLadalilx shivashivA eMba shabadx (savasaM. 2; alalxma. 198-63); satiya keYyalilx~koTuTxdu pArxNaliMga\-valalx sutana keYyalilx koTuTxdu pArxNaliMgavalalx ...tanuva soVMki vajarx\-leVpadaMtirabeVku mana karadalilx koTaTx pArxNaliMga hiMgidare avanaMdeV varxtageVDi (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 363-115); hoVga\-hoVgalu kANabx muMdaNa BAgadali shivaliMgavade niVM hoVgu ninanxya pArxNaliMgaM tAnaduve (basapu. 17-4); sUkaSxmXtara\-tatatxvXveV pArxNaliMgavenikuM (shivaciM. 49-6).} \artha{AdhAra\-sAthxnadalilx cinanxda baNaNx, haqdaya\-dalilx havaLaparxBe matutx BUrxmadhayx\-dalilx diVpaparxkAshavuLaLxMtaha liMga. haqdaya\-kamaladoLage kalAyxNa\-kAri pArxNagaLalilx oLagiruva manasisxnalilx virAji\-suva \hbox{joyxVtiliRMga}:}}
\medskip
\begin{shl}
AdhAreV kanakaparxKayxM haqdayeV vidurxmaparxBamf |\\[2pt]
BUrxmadheyxV diVpasaMkAshaM pArxNaliMgaM parxkiVtiRtamf ||\\[2pt]
joyxVtiliRMgamidaM vidavxnf dhAyxnasAthxnaM maheVshituH |\\[2pt]
joyxVtiliRMgaM viBAveyxYva tatarx dheyxVyaH paraH shivaH ||\\[2pt]
pArxNeVSavxMtamaRnaHsAthxnaM haqdayAbajxgataM shivamf |\\[2pt]
liMgaM yatf tadiha gArxhayxM pArxNaliMgasamAhavxyamf ||\\[-1pt]
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(caM.A., kirx.pA., 3. 33-35; si.shi., 6. 40)}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{BeVda - pArxNaliMgavu caraliMga matutx shivaliMga eMdu eraDu vidhavAgutatxde. shivaliMgavu parashivana aGoVramuKa\-savxrUpa matutx caraliMgavu tatupxruSamuKasavxrUpadAdxgide:}}

\begin{shl}

\smallskip
\newmeaning{\artha{yoVgAMga, BoVgAMga matutx tAyxgAMga eMba mUru vidhada aMgasathxlagaLalilx BoVgAMgavu pArxNaliMga eniside. shivanoMdige BoVgavuMTAguvudariMda BoVgAMga eMba hesaru:}}
\medskip
\begin{shl}
aMgasathxlaM tirxdhA jecnxVyaM AcAyeRYH sUkaSxmXdashiRBiH~|\\[2pt]
yoVgAMgaM parxthamaM porxVkatxM BoVgAMgaM tu divxtiVyakamf~||\\[2pt]
shiveVna saha BoVgeVna BoVgAMgamiti kathayxteV |\\[-1pt]
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(a.sU., 4. 5-8)}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\artha{savaRtatatxvXmayavAda pArxNa, savaRjAcnxnamayanAda \hbox{shiva}-ivaribabxra samAyoVga. sUyaRnalilx maMju laya\-vAgu\-vaMte pArxNavAyuvu parabarxhamxmayavAda shiva\-liMga\-dalilx layavanunx hoMduvudeV pArxNaliMga:}}
\medskip
\begin{shl}

anayoVyoRVgameVveYtatf pArxNaliMgamihoVcayxteV ||\\[-1pt]
\end{shl}

\end{shl}
\smallskip
\pauthor{(si.shi. 12. 7)}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\artha{savxyaMBuliMga, bANaliMga, calaliMga, saMkiVNaRliMga, pArxNaliMga eMba aidu bageya liMgagaLalilx oMdu:}
\ullekha{hoVgahoVgalu kANebx muMdaNa BAgadali shivaliMgavade niVM hoVgu ninanxya pArxNa\-liMgaM tAnaduve (basapu. 17-4); sUkaSxmXtaratatatxvXveV pArxNa\-liMgavenikuM (shivaciM. 49-6); savxyaMBuliMga bANaliMga calaliMga saMkiVNaRliMga pArxNaliMgaveMba paMcavidhaliMgaMgaLaM tamamx tamamx shakatxyXnusAramAdacaRnAtatapxrarAgalevxVLukxM (viveVka. 92).}}

\meaning{\arthanonum{pArxNaliMgada savxrUpavanunx nirUpisuva sathxla (noVDi. pArxNaliMgisathxla):} \ullekha{pArxNaliMgasathxla nimagelilxyadu? parxsAdasathxla nimagelilxyadu? OgaravanuMDu AgAdeveMdaDe mUga\-koyAyxda mAnibxde namamx kUDala\-saMgama deVvanu ? (savasaM. 1; basava. 1062-286); pArxNaliMgasathxlaM tirxvidhavaM\-geYsuvAcAra supArxNiyeY baLika liMgasupArxNi jaMgamamahApArxNi (viVsheYpu. 8-124-41); pArxNaliMgasathxlave marutAMga (cebapu. 61-29).}}
\vskip 5pt
\newmeaning{\ni{pArxNaliMgaM iti sathxlaM - pArxNaliMgasathxlaM}}
\end{entry}
%manoVguNa aLidAga pArxNaliMgasathxla... (savasaM. 2; alalxma. 1364-402); loVkAcAra nibaMdheVna loVka loVka vivajiRtaM | loVkAcAraM paritayxjayx pArxNalimgasathxlaM BaveVtf... (savasaM. 6; uripe. 1456-508); parxsAdaliMgasaMbaMdhi\-gaLu pArxNaliMgasathxlavanariyaru... (savasaM. 8; moVLimA. 1539-513); pArxNaliMgasathxlavuLaLxvaMge vAyevxVMdirxyaparxkaqtiyeV shaturx kANA... (savasaM. 12; deVshikeVM. 1089-319);

\begin{entry}
\word{pArxNaliMgAcaRka}
\meaning{\arthanonum{iSaTxliMgAcaRka, pArxNaliMgAcaRka matutx BAvaliMgAcaRka eMba tirxvidha sharaNaralilx obabx; BeVda\-BAvavilalxdiruvavanu:}
\ullekha{sharaNasathxla tirxvidha: iSaTxliMgAcaRka, pArxNaliMgAcaRka, taqpitxliMgAcaRka (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 720-215); A pArxNaliMgAcaRkanAda liMgAMgasaMbaMdhiyeV viVrasheYvaneMdarivudu (savasaM. 6; Adayayx. 993-301); savxyaMcaraparavana{\ri}yanAgi pArxNaliMgAcaRkanuM (viVsheYpu. 8-124-44); tAnu matutx tananx sutatxlina parisithxti ivugaLalilx yAva tarada BeVdabudidhxyuLaLxvaniruvadilAlxdadxriMda avanu pArxNa\-liMgAcaRkanu (shivAkoV. 42-67).}}
\vskip 5pt
\newmeaning{\ni{pArxNaliMgasayx acaRkaH - pArxNaliMgAcaRkaH}}
\end{entry}

\begin{entry}
\word{pArxNaliMgAcaRna}
\meaning{\artha{iSaTxliMgada pUjAnaMtara manasisx\-nalilxyeV adara dhAyxna mADuvudu:}}
\medskip
\begin{shl}
tadAdhxyXnaM manasA yatarx pArxNaliMgAcaRnaM matamf |\\[-1pt]
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(sU.A., kirx.pA., 6. 47)}
\medskip
\newmeaning{\artha{aMtaraMgadalilxruva cidAkArarUpavAda shivarUpi\-liMgavanunx BAvapuSapxgaLiMda mADuva
pUje. A pUjA\-karxmavu hiVgide: aMtaraMgada pArxNavAyuviniMda vAyxpi\-siruva, atayxMta
sUkaSxmXvAda AkAshadiMda shoVBisuva shirasisxnalilxruva barxhamxraMdharxdalilxruva
caMdarxmaMDaladiMda \hbox{sarxvisuva} amaqtada dhAreyiMda shiVtalavAda shorxVtArxdi (kivi modalAda)
iMdirxyagaLa navadAvxragaLanunx baMdhisi\-koMDu shivajAcnxnaveMba diVpadalilx haqdayasAthxnadalilxruva
padamxpiVThadalilx nelesiruva dAvxdashadaLakaNiRkeyalilx suKAsiVna\-nAgiruva
maMgala\-mUtiRyAda cililxMgavanunx pArxNaliMgaveMdu BAvisikoMDu guruviniMda
upadiSaTxvAda karxmadalilx dhAyxnisutAtx, BAvavasutxgaLiMda pUjisuva parxkirxye.}}
\vskip 4pt
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\qquad pArxNaliMgAcaRne mADuva BAvapuSapxgaLivu - kaSxmeyeV aBiSeVkada niVru, viveVkaveV
vasatxrX, satayxvanunx nuDiyuvudeV ABaraNa, veYrAgayxveV hUmAle, samAdhisithxtiyeV gaMdha,
nira\-haMkAraveV akaSxte, sharxdedhxyeV dhUpa, jagatatxnunx beLaguva mahAjAcnxnaveV diVpa, BArxMtimUlavAda jagatatxnunx niveVdisuvudeV neYveVdayx, mwnaveV GaMTAnAda, shabadx-sapxshARdi
viSaya\-gaLanunx apiRsuvudeV tAMbUla, viSayaBArxMtirahitatatxvXveV parxdakiSxNe,
budidhxyanunx tAdAtamxyXgoLisuvudeV namasAkxra:}}
\medskip
\begin{shl}
aMtagaRtaM cidAkAraM liMgaM shivamayaM paramf |\\[2pt]
pUjayxMteV BAvapuSepxYyaRtf pArxNaliMgAcaRnaM hi tatf ||\\[2pt]
aMtaHpavanasaMsapxqqSeTxV susUkASxmXMbarashoVBiteV |\\[2pt]
mUdhaRnayxcaMdarxvigalatfsudhAseVkAtishiVtaleV ||\\[2pt]
badedhxVMdirxyanavadAvxreV boVdhadiVpeV haqdAlayeV |\\[2pt]
padamxpiVTheV samAsiVnaM cililxMgaM shivavigarxhamf ||\\[2pt]
BAvayitAvx sadAkAlaM pUjayeVdABxvavasutxBiH |\\[2pt]
kaSxmABiSeVkasalilaM viveVkoV vasatxrXmucayxteV |\\[2pt]
satayxmABaraNaM porxVkatxM veYrAgayxM puSapxmAlikA ||\\[2pt]
gaMdhaH samAdhisaMpatitxrakaSxtA nirahaMkaqtiH |\\[2pt]
sharxdAdhx dhUpoV mahAjAcnxnaM jagadABxsiparxdiVpikA ||\\[2pt]
BArxMtimUlaparxpaMcasayx niveVdayxM taninxveVdanamf |\\[2pt]
mwnaM GaMTAparisapxMdasAtxMbUlaM viSayApaRNamf ||\\[2pt]
viSayaBArxMtirAhitayxM tatapxrXdakiSxNakalapxnA |\\[2pt]
budedhxVsatxdAtimxkA shakitxnaRmasAkxrakirxyA matA ||\\
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(si.shi., 12. 13-19; shi.ta.ra., 8-7. 81, 83)}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\ullekha{paramAnaMdada maThadoLage, pArxNaliMgAcaRneya mADuva mahAmahimara toVri badukisA, kUDala\-cenanxsaMgayAyx (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 1343-474); liMgasaMgasayx mAterxVNa manaH pArxponxVti liMgatAM | liMgApaRNamidaM deVvi pArxNa\-liMgAcaRnaM sadA... (savasaM. 6; uripe. 1470-514).}}
\vskip 5pt
\newmeaning{\ni{pArxNaliMgasayx acaRnaM - pArxNaliMgAcaRnaM}}
\end{entry}
%pArxNaliMgisathxla pArxNaliMgAcaRnesathxla shivayoVga samAdhi sathxla liMganijasathxlAMga liMgasathxlaMgaLeMdeYderanaduM savxshiVma kAyamAdudayayx. (savasaM. 11; imamxDi. 1235-576); pArxNaliMgisathxla, pArxNaliMgAcaRnAsathxla shivayoVga samAdhisathxla, liMganijasathxla, aMgaliMgasathxla I aidu pArxNaliMgisathxlaM\-gaLu. (savasaM. 14; SaNumxKa. 780-355); tirxvidhaliMgadoLage navaliMgava hudugisi ide nishUyxnayx bedUrxpa GanaliMgamUtiR pArxNaliMgAcaRneyeMdu pUNARnu BAvaBaritavAgi. (savasaM. 14; mUrusA. 22-20).

\vskip 3pt

\begin{entry}
\word{pArxNaliMgAcaRnasathxla}
\meaning{\arthanonum{pArxNaliMgisathxlada aidu vidha aMgasathxlagaLalilx oMdu avAMtarasathxla. shivayoVga\-sAdhaneya mUlaka aMtaraMgadalilx pArxNavAyuvu vAyxpisiruva, atayxMta sUkaSxmXvAda AkAshadiMda shoVBisuva barxhamx\-raMdharxdalilxruva pUNaRcaMdarxmaMDaladiMda sarxvisuva amaqta\-dhAreyiMda shiVtala\-vAda iMdirxyagaLa navadAvxragaLanunx baMdhisikoMDu haqdayasAthxnadalilxruva padamxpiVThadalilx (dAvxdasha\-dala\-kamala\-piVTha\-dalilx) nelesiruva maMgaLamUtiRyAda cililxMgavanunx pArxNaliMgaveMba BAvaneyiMda dhAyxnisutAtx, BAvavasutxgaLiMda mADuva pUjege saMbaMdhisida sathxla:}}
\medskip
\begin{shl}
pArxNaliMgisathxlaM ceYtatf paMcasathxlasamanivxtamf |\\[2pt]
pArxNaliMgisathxlaM cAdw pArxNaliMgAcaRnaM tataH ||\\[-1pt]
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(si.shi., 12.4)}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\ullekha{pArxNaliMgada susaMbaMdhadoLagaviraLa pArxNaviMtAgi rAjisu\-tipaR liMgasupArxNiya mahApArxNaliMga pUjAkarxmaMgaLAloVkanavadu meVNu kAyada karadoLu liMgakUTavu shivA\-Natiya caluvamatigaLigadhigAratiyanUNeyaMbogadetatxlA pArxNa\-liMgAcaRnAsathxlaM (viVsheYpu. 8-125-48); pArxNaliMga\-saMbaMdhavaMtanAda pArxNaliMgiya pArxNaliMgapUjAkarxma\-veMtidiRtetxMdoDe muMde pArxNa\-liMgAcaRnesathxlavAdudu (keYvasha. 56-1 sUtarxM).}}
\vskip 6pt
\newmeaning{\ni{pArxNaliMgAcaRnaM iti sathxlaM - pArxNaliMgAcaRnasathxlaM}}
\vskip 5pt
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\SEE{pArxNaliMgAcaRna}}}
\end{entry}
%pArxNaliMgisathxla, pArxNaliMgAcaRnAsathxla... (savasaM. 14; SaNumxKa. 954-430);

\begin{entry}
\word{pArxNaliMgApaRNa}
\meaning{\arthanonum{parishudadhxvAda AcaraNegaLigAgi tananx manashushxdidhxyanunx mADikoLuLxva saluvAgi manasasxnunx pArxNaliMgakekx apiRsuvudu:}
\ullekha{iSaTxliMgApaRNavAdudu, pArxNaliMgA\-paRNavAdudu BAvaliMgApaRNavAduduyeMdare heVLiye keVLirayayx (savasaM. 11; toVMTasi. 532-243); ruci\-yAgi baMda padAthaRvanunx manada keYyalilx jihevxya muKadalilx pArxNaliMgakekx apiRsabeVku ...hiVge mADidalilx aMga mana BAva\-gaLu paramAtamxnalilx layavAguvavu. ivugaLige anukarxmavAgi iSaTxliMgApaRNa, pArxNaliMgApaRNa, BAvaliMgApaRNa eMba hesaru\-gaLuMTAgutatxve (shivAkoV. 76-143).}}
\vskip 6pt
\newmeaning{\ni{pArxNaliMgasayx apaRNaM - pArxNaliMgApaRNaM}}
\end{entry}

\begin{entry}
\word{pArxNaliMgi}
\meaning{\artha{Bakatxsathxla, mAheVshavxrasathxla, parxsAdisathxlagaLalilx kamaR\-yoVgada pArxdhAnayxdiMda Bakatx, maheVsha, parxsAdi eMdu kareyalAguva obabxneV sAdhakanu, pakavxvAda manasisxniMda jAcnxna\-yoVgasaMpananxnAdare avaneV pArxNaliMgi eMdenisutAtxne. cidUrxpavAda shivaliMgaveV barxhamx. adara shakitxyeV pArxNa\-rUpavu. averaDara (shiva-shakitxyara) savxrUpavanunx arita sAdhaka:}}
\medskip
\begin{shl}
BakotxV mAheVshavxrashecxYSa parxsAdiVti ca kiVtiRtaH |\\[2pt]
kamaRpArxdhAnayxyoVgeVna jAcnxnayoVgoV{\char'263}sayx kathayxteV ||\\[2pt]
liMgaM cidAtamxkaM barxhamx tacaCxkitxH pArxNarUpiNiV |\\[2pt]
tadUrxpaliMgavijAcnxniV pArxNaliMgiVti kathayxteV ||\\[-1pt]
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(si.shi., 12. 2-3)}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\artha{bAhayxvasutxgaLalilx (sAthxvaraliMga matutx adara pUjAparikaragaLalilx) parAknumxKanAgi
keVvala saMvililxMgada (jAcnxnarUpavAda pArxNaliMgada) parAmashiRyAgiruva yoVgi:}}
\medskip
\begin{shl}
saMvililxMgaparAmashiRV bAhayxvasutxparAknumxKaH |\\[2pt]
yaH sadA vataRteV yoVgiV pArxNaliMgiV sa ucayxteV ||\\[-1pt]
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(si.shi., 12.10)}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\artha{sadavxsutx BAvarUpavAdudu pArxNamayiV shakitx, sadUrxpa\-vAdudu pArxNaliMga eMdu
tiLidu iveraDara sAmarasayxda anuBavavuLaLx sAdhaka:}}
\medskip
\begin{shl}
saMvililxMgaparAmashiRV bAhayxvasutxparAknumxKaH |\\[2pt]
yaH sadA vataRteV yoVgiV pArxNaliMgiV sa ucayxteV ||\\[2pt]
satAtx pArxNamayiV shakitxH sadUrxpaM pArxNaliMgakamf |\\[2pt]
tatAsxmarasayxvijAcnxnAtf pArxNaliMgiVti kathayxteV ||\\[-1pt]
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(si.shi., 12. 10, 12)}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\artha{iSaTxliMga matutx pArxNaliMgagaLeraDU oMde eMdu tiLidu pArxNaliMga savxrUpanAgi liMgAnaMdavanunx anuBavisutatx anuBAvaBakitxyiMda pArxNaliMgAcaRne mADuvudu:} \ullekha{iSaTxliMga pArxNaliMga oMdeyeMda{\ri}du pArxNaliMgasavxrUpanAgi liMga\-suKavananuBavisutatx eraDaLidu anuBAvaBakitxyiMda pArxNa\-liMgAcaRne mADutitxpupxdeV pArxNaliMgiyeMdu heVLalAyitutx (liMgaliV. 235-8).} \artha{pArxNagaLeV liMgaveMdu tiLidu, anusaMdhAnamADuva yoVgi:}}
\medskip
\begin{shl}
pArxNAH Eva hi liMgaM ceVtayxnusaMdhAnavAnf pumAnf ||\\[2pt]
sa Eva pArxNaliMgiVti porxVcayxteV sUkaSxmXdashiRBiH ||\\[-1pt]
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(kirx.sA., BA-3, pu.~112)}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\ullekha{Bakatx, mAheVshavxra, parxsAdi, pArxNaliMgi, sharaNaneYkayxnu melalx\-melalxne AdeheneMbananxbara nAnu vajarxdeVhiye ? (savasaM. 1; basava. 897-234); A sAvadhAnadoLagaNa sAvxnu\-BAvadiMda pArxNaliMgiyAgi A sAvxnu\-BAvadoLagaNa ariviniMda sharaNa\-nAgi (savasaM. 2; alalxma. 1527-454).} \artha{sapatx vayxsana biTuTx liMga vayxsaniyAda sAdhaka:} \ullekha{sapatx vayxsanagaLa biTuTx\break liMga vayxsaniyAgabalalxre kUDala\-cenanxsaMgayayxnalilx pArxNaliMgi\-gaLeMbenu (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 330-107); pArxNaliMgi\-yAdAtanu parxLayakokxLagAganu (savasaM. 4; \hbox{sidadhxrA.} 792-224); manavu GanadoLagihudu pArxNaliMgige sahaja gati pApapuNayx\-rahitarf pArxNaliMgi\-gaLu sithxtiya liMgadoLuLaLxvarf pArxNaliMgi\-gaLu (diVkASxboV. 119-4).}}
\vskip 5pt
\newmeaning{\ni{pArxNaH Eva liMgaM asayx iti - pArxNaliMgiV}}
\end{entry}
%\arthanonum{deVheVMdirxyAdigaLalilx pArxNa heVge savaR samAveVshiyAgideyoV  hAge deVheVMdirxyAdigaLalilx liMgavanunx parxtiSAThxpisikoMDavanu.}
%baride Bakatx mAheVshavxra parxsAdi pArxNaliMgi sharaNa aikayx guru caraparaveMdu bo\-gaLuva kuninxgaLa noVDi enanx mana beragu nibebxragu Amitatxyoyx. (savasaM. 5; akakxma. 25-08);

\begin{entry}
\word{pArxNaliMgisathxla}
\meaning{\artha{SaTfsathxlagaLalilx nAlakxneya sathxla.
caraliMgada upAsaka rUpadiMda uMTAguva sathxla. pArxNa, iMdirxyAdigaLa viSayadalilx mamatavx
(nAnu, nananxdu eMba) budidhxyuMToV A moVhavanunx tayxjisi paMcapArxNasahitavAda
manasasxnunx liMgadalilx sAthxpisuvudanunx nirUpisuva sathxla:}}
\medskip
\begin{shl}
Adw BakatxsathxlaM porxVkatxM tatoV mAheVshavxrasathxlamf |\\[2pt]
parxsAdisathxlamanayxtutx pArxNaliMgisathxlaM tataH ||\\[-1pt]
\end{shl}
\smallskip
\pauthor{(si.shi., 5. 24)}
\medskip
\begin{shl}
tadupAsakarUpatAvxtf pArxNaliMgisathxlaM baBw |\\[-1pt]
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(a.sU., 3. 39)}
\medskip
\begin{shl}
pArxNeVMdirxyAdiSu mamAhamiti parxmoVhaM |\\[2pt]
saMBArxMtisidadhxmapahAyasamasatxmeVtatf ||\\[2pt]
liMgeV nidhAya manasA yadanuparxyukatxM\\[2pt]
tatf pArxNaliMgi sucarasathxlamAhurAyARH ||\\[-1pt]
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(a.sU., 4.30)}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{vacanakArara parxkAra sharaNana AdhAyxtimxka munanxDeyalilx pArxNa\-liMgisathxla oMdu
 meYligalulx. iSaTxliMgapUje muMtAda vidhigaLanunx Acarisi, parashiva
horagidAdxne, eMdu modalu tiLididadx avanu, Iga dhAyxna japa,
maMtarxgaLanunx Acarisi, parashiva pArxNarUpadalilxdAdxne eMdu
tiLidukoMDidAdxne. modalinaMte Iga parashivanige horagina
padAthaRgaLanunx apiRsade, tananx kAyeVMdirxyAdigaLanenxV apiRsikoMDa
pArxNaliMgiyu tananxlelx iruva parashivananunx kANatoDagidAdxne.}}
\vskip 4pt
\newmeaning{\artha{pArxNaliMgisathxlada aidu vidha aMgasathxlagaLalilx oMdu avAMtarasathxla. bAhayxliMga
(sAthxvaraliMga) vanunx matutx A \hbox{liMgada} pUjAsAmagirxgaLAda vasutxgaLanunx tayxjisi,
cidUrxpa pArxNaliMgada vicAradalilx maganxnAguva shivayoVgiyu pArxNaliMgi
eMdenisutAtxne. mAyAvikalapxdiMda janisida jagatutx heVyavAdudeMdu sadA
ciMtisutAtx sacicxdAnaMdarUpa liMga\-dalilx maganxnAguva yoVgiyu pArxNaliMgi. aMtaha
pArxNa\-liMgiya mahAtemxyanunx boVdhisuva sathxla:}}
\medskip
\begin{shl}
pArxNaliMgisathxlaM ceYtatf paMcasathxlasamanivxtamf |\\[2pt]
pArxNaliMgisathxlaM cAdw... ||\\[2pt]
saMvililxMgaparAmashiRV bAhayxvasutxparAknumxKaH |\\[2pt]
yaH sadA vataRteV yoVgiV pArxNaliMgiV sa ucayxteV ||\\[2pt]
mAyAvikalapxjaM vishavxM heVyaM saMciMtayx nitayxshaH |\\[2pt]
cidAnaMdamayeV liMgeV viliVnaH pArxNaliMgavAnf ||\\[-1pt]
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(si.shi., 12. 4, 10-11)}
\medskip
\newmeaning{\artha{BeVda-aMgasathxlagata pArxNaliMgisathxladalilx pArxNaliMgisathxla, pArxNaliMgAcaRnasathxla, shivayoVgasamAdhisathxla, liMganijasathxla matutx aMgaliMgasathxla eMdu aidu avAMtara sathxlagaLive:}}
\medskip
\begin{shl}
pArxNaliMgisathxlaM ceYtatf paMcasathxlasamanivxtamf |\\[2pt]
pArxNaliMgisathxlaM cAdw pArxNaliMgAcaRnaM tataH ||\\[2pt]
shivayoVgasamAdhishacx tatoV liMganijasathxlamf |\\[2pt]
aMgaliMgasathxlaM cAtha karxmAdeVSAM BidoVcayxteV ||\\[-1pt]
\end{shl}
\smallskip
\pauthor{(si.shi., 12. 4-5)}
\medskip
\newmeaning{\artha{liMgasathxlagata pArxNaliMgisathxla(caraliMgasathxla)dalilx Atamxsathxla, aMtarAtamx\-sathxla, paramAtamxsathxla, nideRVhAgamasathxla, niBARvA\-gama\-sathxla, naSATxgamasathxla, AdiparxsAdisathxla, aMtayxparxsAdisathxla, seVvayx\-parxsAdisathxla eMdu oMbatutx avAMtara sathxlagaLive:}}
\medskip
\begin{shl}
sathxlAnAM navakaM porxVkatxM pArxNaliMgisathxlAshirxtamf |\\[2pt]
AdAvAtamxsathxlaM porxVkatxM aMtarAtamxsathxlaM tataH ||\\[2pt]
paramAtamxsathxlaM pashAcxtf nideRVhAgamasaMjacnxkamf |\\[2pt]
niBARvAgamasaMjacnxM ca tatoV naSATxgamasathxlamf ||\\[2pt]
AdiparxsAdanAmAtha tatoV{\char'263}payxMtayxparxsAdakamf |\\[2pt]
seVvayxparxsAdakaM cAtha shaqNu teVSAM ca lakaSxNamf ||\\[-1pt]
\end{shl}
\medskip

\begin{entry}

\meaning{\arthanonum{AdhAyxtimxka dAriyalilx parxgati \hbox{sAdhisida} Bakatxnu karasathxladalilx mAtarxvalalxde, deVhada elelxDeyalilxyU liMgasAthxpane mADabeVku. I BAvakekx pArxNa\-liMgisathxlavenunxtAtxre. idaralilx mUru upaBAgagaLidudx avugaLanunx anukarxma\-vAgi AcArapArxNi, liMgapArxNi matutx jaMgamapArxNi eMdu kareyalAgide. pArxNaliMgisathxlada modalaneV haMtadalilx Bakatxnu bAhayx AcAragaLige hecucx mahatavx koDutAtxne. sAnxna, liMgapUje, maMtarx, guru jaMgamagaLalilx \hbox{Bakitx}, parxsAda - pAdoVdaka seVvane, muMtAda bAhayx AcAra\-gaLu AdhAyxtimxka jiVvanakekx pArxraMBadalilx AvashayxkavAdarU aveV koneyalalx. Bakatx inUnx muMdakekx hoVgabeVkAdare, \hbox{shivanu} tananxlilxyeV idAdxneMdu tiLidu, dhAyxnada mUlaka shivananunx talupalu parxyatinxsabeVku. I parxyatanxvu avananunx liMgapArxNiyanAnxgi mADutatxde. dhAyxnada mUlaka avana matutx \hbox{shivana} \hbox{madheyx} dUra kaDimeyAdAga, (athavA avanu terehilalxda Ganadalilx oMdA\-dAga) avanu tAneV liMgaveMdukoLuLxtAtxne. hiVge avanu naDedADuva liMgavAdudariMda avanu jaMgama pArxNisathxladalilxdAdxneMdathaR:} 
\ullekha{pArxNaliMgisathxlatirxvidha AcArapArxNi liMgapArxNi jaMgamapArxNi adakekx vivara manoVvAkAkxyadalilx AcArava avagarxhisihanAgi AcArapArxNi bAhoyxVpacAraMgaLa ma\char'273\char'311du liMgakekx tananx pArxNavane\break pUjeya mADuvanAgi liMgapArxNi bAhayxBakitxya ma\char'273\char'311du \hbox{jaMgamakekx} tananx tanu mana pArxNaMgaLa niveVdisuvanAgi jaMgamapArxNi (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 987-322).}}
\end{entry}

\begin{entry}
\word{bayalu}
\meaning{\arthanonum{mukitx: parashiva, AkAsha, cidAkAsha, cidaMbara, shUnayx, shUnayxsathxla, niHshUnayx idara payARya pada\-gaLu.} \artha{jagatutx utapxtitxyAguvudakekx muMce idadx sithxti; \hbox{niravaya}; shUnayx:}
\ullekha{ArU ariyada bayaloLage bayalAgi niMda nilava \hbox{hiDidenanx} karadalilx toVride guruve (savasaM. 5; akakxma. 41-16); ADabArada bayalu sUDabArada bayalu nuDiyabArada bayalu hiDiyabArada bayalu I oDalilalxda bayaloLage aDagiduR BeVdava I loVkada jaDaretatx \hbox{balalxreY} (savasaM. 7; jeVDarA. 725-233); jagatutx parxkaTa\-vAgada sithxtiyanunx vacanakAraru bayaleMtalU shUnayxveMtalU niravaya\-veMtalU kareyutAtxre ...idu atayxMta shAMtasatxbadhx \hbox{sithxtiyu}, EneVnU toVrada sithxtiyu (shivAkoV. 1-1).}
\artha{shUnayxdoMdige beretuhoVguvudu, oMdAguvudu; aikayx.}
\artha{rUpavilalxdudu; nirAkAravAdudu.}
\artha{paravasutx; parashiva:}
\ullekha{saqSiTx pUvaRda paravasutxvanUnx shUnayxveMdeV nideRVshisutAtxre. adanunx acacxgananxDa shabadx `bayalu' eMdU nideRVshisutAtxre (shUnayxku. 30).}
\artha{``mithayxvAda mAyAparxpaMcu" (basaTiV. {\rm\em{II,}} 220-859 TiVku):}
\ullekha{naDuve nAnididxheneMdaDe, tanonxDa\-loLage oDedu mUDitutx tananxMte bayalu!... (savasaM. 2; alalxma. 1339-395); arivaratu kuruhu samamxtavAdare Bakatx (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 791-234); Adiyalilx bayalu, aMtayxdalilx bayalu, madhayxdalilx toVri keDuvudadu noVDA, I GaTavu (savasaM. 4; sidadhxrA. 1804-515); Ura oLagaNa bayalu, Ura horagaNa bayaleMduMTe ?... (savasaM. 5; boMtAdeV. 1094-724); bayalu mUtiR\-yAgadaMte... (savasaM. 6; amugi. 339-113).}  \artha{bayaladeVhi: paMcaBUtagaLa keTaTx pariNAmavanunx ilalxvAgisidavanu; tananx deVhavanunx parashivana\break athavA bayalina aMgavanAnxgi (BAgavanAnxgi) mADikoMDavanu:}
\ullekha{I tirxvidhavanu tirxvidhakitutx, tA bayaladeVhiyAdanayAyx\break A mahAsharaNanu (savasaM. 5; haDaliM. 1250-380).} \artha{bayalasamAdhi: aSaTxvidhasamAdhigaLalilx oMdu:} \ullekha{pArxNa\-liMgakekx kAraNavAda jaMgamaliMgAnuBavavanunx hoMdidavarige saMbaMdhavu (shivAkoV. 155-383).} \artha{aikayxvAgu; liVna\-vAgu:} \ullekha{I tirxvidhavanu koTuTx kUDala\-cenanxsaMgayayxnalilx basavaNaNxMge bayalasamAdhiyAyitutx... (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 1258-438); vayxkAtxvayxkatxvanoLakoMDu bayalasamAdhiyalilx\break silukitutx... (savasaM. 6; Adayayx. 1139-356); kapapxDiya\break saMgayayxnoLage bayalAdanu (aKaMDeV. 327-28).} \artha{gatisu; maraNahoMdu:} \ullekha{enanx ciMtAmaNiye meVruve enanx sajajxnamitarxneV niVniMdu bayalAdeY (basapu. 35-2).} \artha{bayalapAsha: citfsavxrUpada bayalanunx deVheVMdirx\-yAdi karaNa\-gaLu baMdhisi, adanunx jiVvAtamxnenisuvaMte mADive. I karaNAdigaLa doVSa nivArisalapxTaTxre, kiridAda (pAshakokxLagAda) bayalu mahAbayalanunx (parashivananunx) seVri oMdAgutatxde:}
\ullekha{sharaNaMge bayalapAsha baMdu kaTiTxralu, bayalaliMga baMdu biDisalu, bayalu bayalu EkavAyitutx (savasaM. 9; hAvina. 1127-353).} \artha{bayalaBArxMta: jiVvanada paramoVdedxVsha parashivaneMba bayalinalilx oMdAguvudu eMbudanunx ariyade kaSxNika aihika vasutxgaLanenxV tamamx\break dheyxVyavanAnxgi mADikoMDavanu:} \ullekha{atitxtatxlukade... bayala\-BArxMtariginenxMtu pArxNaliMgada parxsAda sAdhayxvapupxdu heVLA (savasaM. 12; deVshikeVM. 545-165).}}
\end{entry}
%parashivananunx bayaligeV (AkAshakekxV) Eke hoVlisabeVku eMbudakekx kelavu kAraNagaLive. 1. yAvudeV vasutxvAgali, adu eSeTxV doDaDxdirali, AkAshavu adanunx AvarisikoLuLx\-tatxdeyAdudariMda, elalx vasutxgaLigiMtalU athavA iDiV vishavxkikxMtalU AkAshaveV \hbox{doDaDxdu} enanxbahudu. hAgeyeV elalx vasutxgaLanUnx parashivanu oLagoLuLxvudariMda, avanU AkAshadaMtidAdxne enanxbahudu. vishavxvanonxLagoLuLxva AkAshavu BwtAkAshavAdare vishavxvanUnx, BwtAkAshavanUnx oLagoLuLxva parashivanu cidAkAsha. eraDaneyadAgi, moVDa, dhULu, muMtAda tAtAkxlika GaTane\-gaLu AkAshada mUlasavxrUpavanunx badalAyisuvudilalx. adeV riVti cidAkAshadalilxruva vasutx\-gaLu avu eSeTxV keTaTxdidadxrU cidAkAshavanunx keDisalAravu. mUraneV kAraNa modalaneya eraDu kAraNagaLigiMta muKayxvAdudu. eraDu athavA hecucx vasutxgaLa madheyx iruva AkAshavanunx tiLidukoLaLxbahudeV horatu, vasutxrahita AkAshavananxlalx. eraDu vasutxgaLa madhayxdalilxruva AkAsha doDaDxdu athavA saNaNxdu eMdU, aneVka vasutx\-gaLa madhayxdalilxruva AkAsha cwkAkAradudx, GanAkaqti\-yuLaLxdudx eMdU vaNiRsabahudu. AkAshadalilx yAva vasutxgaLU ilalxdidadxre, adu saNaNxdU alalx, doDaDxdU alalx, tirxkoVNAkaqtiyU alalx, cwkAkaqtiyU alalx, matAtxva AkaqtiyU alalx. adu vaNaRnege sikukxvudilalx. adeV riVti parashivanalilx vishavxveV ilalxdaMtha avasethxyalilx (shakitxyu avayxkatxvAgiruvaMtha parxlayasithxtiyalilx) parashivanu kAraNanU alalx, kArayxnU alalx, doDaDxvanU alalx, saNaNxvanU alalx. avanu A sithxtiyalilx vaNaRnAtiVtanAgutAtxne.

\artha{SaTAsxdAKayxgaLalilxya oMdu sAdAKayxda adhideVvateyU saqSiTxkAyaRgaLige muKayxsathxnU Adavanu:}

\artha{paratatatxvXda arivu, jAcnxna:}
\ullekha{barxhamxvanarita matetx sumamxne irabeVku. barxhamxparxsaMgava mADuvalilx parabarxhimxgaLalilx parxsaMgava mADabeVku (savasaM. 6; arimA. 484-151).}

\begin{entry}
\word{BasomxVtApxdana}
\src{saM}
\meaning{\arthanonum{Basamxda tayArike. goVmayadiMda Basamxda tayArike. idakekx BasamxsaMpAdane eMba nAmAMtaravU ide. maMtorxVcAcxraNeyiMda goVmayavanunx suTuTx Basamxvanunx tayArisuvudu, paMcAkaSxra maMtarx\-diMda modalige hasuvanunx aBimaMtirxsabeVku. aSoTxVtatxra\-shata (108)\break maMtarxdiMda aBimaMtirxsida hululx matutx niVranunx \hbox{hasuvige} koDabeVku. shukalxpakaSx athavA kaqSaNxpakaSxda catudaRshiyaMdu upavAsavidudx, pArxtaHkAladalilx edudx shuci\-BURtanAda sAdhakanu sithxracitatxnAgi sAnxnamADi, shuBarxvasatxrXgaLanunx dharisi\break \hbox{hAlanunx} kareyalu hasuvanunx sidadhxgoLisabeVku. hasuvanunx\break meVlebibxsi \hbox{gAyatirx} maMtarxdiMda goVmUtarxvanunx cinanx athavA beVrAvudeV loVhada pAterxyalilx saMgarxhisabeVku.\break goVmaya(sagaNi)yu BUmige biVLuva \hbox{munanxveV} saMgarxhisa\-beVku. eMTu sala mUla(paMcAkaSxriV) maMtarx\-vanunx japisi goVmUtarx matutx goVmayavanunx misharxNa mADi soVsa\-beVku. `BavAya namaH' eMba maMtarxdiMda goVmaya\-doMdige goVmUtarxvanunx misharxNamADi, `shavARya namaH' eMba maMtarxdiMda hadinAlukx uMDegaLanunx mADabeVku. A\break uMDegaLanunx bisilinalilx ELu sala paMcAkaSxramaMtarxdiMda\break oNagisabeVku. anaMtara aginxyanunx sidadhxpaDisi, parxNavasahita paMcAkaSxriyanunxcacxrisutatx A uMDegaLanunx aginxyalilx iDabeVku. vividha maMtarxgaLiMda elalx bageya AhutigaLanunx apiRsi `sadoyxVjAtaM parxpadAyxmi' itAyxdi maMtarx\-gaLiMda shivAginxyalilx suTuTx oNagida Basamxvanunx shoVdhisabeVku (soVsa\-beVku). iMtaha Basamxvanunx matetx goVmUtarxdoMdige misharxNamADi Basamxda gaTiTxgaLanunx tayArisabeVku:}}

\begin{shl}

\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(si. shi., 7. 13)}

\newmeaning{\artha{SaDakaSxra maMtarxdalilxna Aru vaNaR\-gaLu Aru sAdAKayx vAcaka\-gaLu. yakAravu shivasAdAKayx, vAkAravu amUtaRsAdAKayx, shikAravu mUtaRsAdAKayx, makAravu kataqqRsAdAKayx, nakAravu kamaRsAdAKayx, OMkAravu mahA\-sAdAKayxda savxrUpadavu:}}
\medskip
\begin{shl}
parxthamaM shivasAdAKayxmamUtaRM ca tataH paramf |\\[1pt]
tatashacx mUtaRsAdAKayxM tatoV veY kataqqRnAmakamf ||\\[1pt]
kamaRsAdAKayxmaparaM mahArUpamanaMtaramf |\\[1pt]
yAdiparxNavapayaRMtameVvaM jecnxVyaM varAnaneV ||\\[-1pt]
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(sU. A., kirx. pA., 4. 42-43)}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\artha{SaDakaSxra maMtarxda Aru akaSxra\-gaLu Aru liMgasathxla vAcaka\-gaLu. yakAravu parxsAdaliMga, vAkAravu caraliMga, shikAravu shivaliMga, makAravu guruliMga, nakAravu AcAraliMga matutx OMkAravu mahAliMgada vAcaka\-gaLu:}}
\medskip
\begin{shl}
parxsAdashacx carashecxYva shivaliMgaM gurusatxthA |\\[1pt]
AcArashacx mahAliMgaM yAditArAMtagoVcaramf ||\\[-1pt]
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(sU. A., kirx. pA., 4. 44)}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\artha{SaDakaSxramaMtarxda Aru akaSxra\-gaLu SaTfsathxla vAcaka\-gaLu. yakAravu sharaNasathxla, vAkAravu pArxNaliMgisathxla, shikAravu parxsAdisathxla, makAravu mAheVshavxrasathxla, nakAravu Bakatxsathxla matutx OMkAravu aikayxsathxla vAcaka\-gaLu:}}
\medskip
\begin{shl}
aikayxshacx sharaNashecxYva pArxNaliMgiV parxsAdakaH |\\[1pt]
mAheVshavxrashacx Bakatxshacx SaTfsathxlAtAmx SaDakaSxraH ||\\[-1pt]
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(sU. A., kirx. pA., 4. 45)}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\artha{SaDakaSxra\-gaLu Aru vidha hasatxrUpa\-gaLu. yakAravu BAva, vAkAravu jAcnxna, shikAravu manasf, makAravu nirahaMkAra, nakAravu budidhx matutx OMkAravu citatxda savxrUpavAgive:}}
\medskip
\begin{shl}
BAvoV jAcnxnaM ca sumanoV nirahaMkAra Eva ca |\\[1pt]
budidhxshicxtatxM ca BAvAdi hasatxrUpaH SaDakaSxraH ||\\[-1pt]
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(sU. A., kirx. pA., 4. 46)}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\artha{SaDakaSxra\-gaLu Aru vidha barxhamxvAcaka\-gaLu. yakAravu barxhamx, vAkAravu viSuNx, shikAravu rudarx, makAravu Ishavxra, nakAravu sadAshiva matutx OMkAravu parashivana savxrUpavAgive:}}
\medskip
\begin{shl}
barxhAmx viSuNxsatxthA rudarx Ishavxrashacx sadAshivaH |\\[2pt]
tathA parashivashecxYva SaDfdeVvAtAmx SaDakaSxraH ||\\[-1pt]
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(sU. A., kirx. pA., 4. 47)}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\artha{SaDakaSxra\-gaLu Aru baNaNxgaLa vAcaka\-gaLu. yakAra saPxTika vaNaR, vAkAra biLiya baNaNx, shikAra niVlibaNaNx, makAra ratanxparxBeya baNaNx, nakAra haLadi baNaNx matutx OMkAravu vaNAR\-tiVtavAdudu:}}
\medskip
\begin{shl}
saPxTikABoV yakArashacx vAkAraH shevxVtavaNaRkaH |\\[2pt]
niVladuyxtiH shikAraH sAyxdarxkatxkAMtimaRkArakaH |\\[2pt]
nakAraH piVtavaNaRH sAyxtAtxroV vaNARdabxhiH paraH ||\\[-1pt]
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(sU. A., kirx. pA., 4. 48-49)}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\artha{SaDakaSxragaLalilx yakAravu BUmi, vAkAravu niVru, shikAravu beMki, makAravu vAyu, nakAravu AkAragaLige biVja\-gaLAgive. OMkAravu elalx tatatxvXgaLa biVjavAgide:}}
\medskip
\begin{shl}
BUjalAginxmarudfvoyxVmAnxM biVjAneyxVtAni shoVBaneV ||\\[2pt]
parxNavaH savaRtatAtxvXnAM biVjaM kAraNakAraNamf |\\[-1pt]
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(sU. A., kirx. pA., 4. 50-51)}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\artha{SaDakaSxra\-gaLu IshAdi deVvategaLa parxtiVkavAgive. yakArakekx Isha, vAkArakekx maheVsha, shikArakekx shiva, makArakekx videyx, nakArakekx AtAmx matutx OMkArakekx parashiva ivaru\-gaLu deVvate\-gaLu:}}
\medskip
\begin{shl}
IshoV maheVshavxrashecxYva shivoV vidAyx tatheYva ca |\\[2pt]
AtAmx parashivashecxYva yAdiVnAM tatatxvXtaH karxmAtf ||\\[-1pt]
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(sU. A., kirx. pA., 4. 52)}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\artha{SaDakaSxra\-gaLu veVdajAcnxnavAcaka\-gaLu. yakAravu~sAvira veVdagaLaMte, vAkAravu athavaRNveVda, shikAravu sAma\-veVda, makAravu yajuveRVda, nakAravu QugevxVda matutx OMkAravu sAkASxtf jAcnxna savxrUpavAgive:}}
\medskip
\begin{shl}
yANaRM veVdasahasArxDhayxM vANaRM cAthavaRNaM samxqqtamf |\\[2pt]
shikAroV sAmaveVdaH sAyxnamxkAroV yajurucayxteV |\\[2pt]
QugevxVdoV hi nakArashacx jAcnxnAtAmx parxNavaH samxqqtaH ||\\[-1pt]
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(sU. A., kirx. pA., 4. 53)}
\vskip 5pt
\newmeaning{\ni{maMtarxsayx athaRH - maMtArxthaRH}}
\end{entry}

\begin{entry}

\meaning{\artha{mAMsapiMDavanunx maMtarxpiMDavanAnxgisuva oMdu vidhi. vaNARdhavx, padAdhavx matutx maMtArxdhavx eMba mUru adhavxgaLalilx oMdu bage. mUlabarxhAmxMgarUpadiMda hanonxMdu maMtarxgaLanunx oLagoMDiruvudu maMtArxdhavx. idu shabadx\-rUpadudx:}}

savxsitxkAroVhaNABiKAyxM diVkASxM dadAyxdayxthAvidhi ||\\[1pt]
maMtArxdhAvxnaM shabadxrUpaM vinayxseyxYvaM muKeV tathA |\\[-1pt]
\end{shl}
\medskip

tarxyoV{\char'263}dhAvxnoV vaNaRpadamaMtArxtAmxnoV BavaMtiyeV ||\\[-1pt]
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(shi. ta. ra., 9. 3. 84, 88)}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\artha{mahAliMgadiMda sAdAKayx\-gaLu parxkaTagoMDAga jagatitx\-nalilx uMTAda calaneyu parxvahisalu sahAyakavAda maMtarx, pada, vaNaR, Buvana, tatatxvX, kalA eMba SaDadhavx\-gaLalilx oMdu:}
\ullekha{maMtArxdhavxmaM nAyxsaMgeyuvxdiMtu sapatxkoVTi mahAmaMtArxtamx\-vAdiV mahAliMgamaM poragoLagoMdeyeMdeVkaBAvadalilx\-yaciRpudeMdu niravisideyayAyx (savasaM. 11; imamxDi. 1418-655); A mahAliMgave \hbox{BuvanAdhavx} tatAtxvXdhavx vaNARdhavx maMtArxdhavx padAdhavx kalAdhavx modalAda carAcarAtamxkarugaLige tAne janamxsAthxnavAdanu (liMgaliV. 19-6).}}
\vskip 5pt
\newmeaning{\ni{maMtarxsayx adhAvx - maMtArxdhavx}}
\end{entry}
%matatxM, A shiSayxnu sadugxrusAvxmige diVGaRdaMDa namasAkxravaM mADi... maMtArxdhavxdutapxtayxvanu, maMtArxdhavxda vataRneyanu... (savasaM. 13; bAlasaM. 372-168);
%padagaLa mUlaka maMtarx\-gaLu utapxnanxvAgutatxve. iveV maMtArxdhavx, vaNaR, padagaLanonxLagoMDa maMtarx\-gaLu elelxlilxyU tuMbive (shivAkoV. 16-26)

Adare toVMTada sidadhxliMga shivayoVgigaLa parxkAra, savxparxjecnxyilalxda parashivaneV\break shUnayxliMga, savxparxjecnx uMTAgi avanalilx saqSiTxmADa\-beVkeMba iceCx uMTAdare, avanu niHkalaliMga enisikoLuLxtAtxne. niHkala liMgadalilx A \hbox{iceCx} uMTAda kUDale adariMda citutx utapxtitxyAgi, idariMda a, u, makAra\-gaLu utapxtitxyAgi,\break citutx A mUrakaSxragaLanunx kUDikoMDu parxNamavenisi\-koLuLxtatxde; toVMTada sidadhxliMga shivayoVgigaLa parxkAra mahA\-liMgavU oMdu utapxtitxyeV horatu, adeV saqSiTxkataRnalalx.\break Adare, saqSiTxge beVkAda upAdAnakAraNagaLelalxvU mahA\-liMgadalilx aDakavAgive; saqSiTxpUvaRsithxtiya shivana oMdu avasethx:} \ullekha{A OMkAraveMba parxNamaveV, aKaMDa \hbox{paripUNaR}\break goVLakAkAra teVjoVmaya\-mUtiRyapapx mahAliMga (savasaM. 11; toVMTasi. 33-11); paMcashakitxyanu, paMcasAdAKayxvanu, paMcakalegaLanu, paMcAkaSxragaLanu, paMca\-BUtAtamxvanu tananxlilx gaBiRVkarisikoMDu tAnu cidfbarxhAmxMDAtamxka\-nAgi (savasaM. 11; toVMTasi. 36-12).}}

\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\qquad I mahAliMga tAnobabxneV, aMdare keVvala icACxmAtarx\-diMdaleV saqSiTxsalAra. hAge mADalu avanige shakitx beVku. shakitxyU saha A sithxtiyalilx nAmarUpagaLilalxda avayxkatxsithxti\-yalilxdudx, mahAliMgana oMdu aviBAjayx aMgavAgide. parashivana A avasethxge mahAliMga eMba hesaru heVge anavxyavAguvaMte shakitxya Agina avasethxge cicaCxkitx eMba hesaru anavxyavAgutatxde.}}
\vskip 3pt
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\qquad shUnayxsithxtiyiMda utapxtitxyAda AdiliMga; saqSiTx sithxti layagaLige kAraNavAda mUlashivatatatxvX; shUnayxdiMda parxkaTa\-goMDa mUlacitutx savaRvAyxpiyAdudu. anaMtara udayi\-sida nAda, biMdu, kale\-gaLu mUlacitutxvinoMdige beretAga OMkAra\-parxNava athavA mahAliMga utapxtitx\-yAyitu. idu atayxMta teVjoVmayavU ceYtanayxsavxrUpavU goVLA\-kAravU Adudu. paMcasAdAKayx\-gaLu, paMcashakitx\-gaLu, paMca\-BUta\-gaLu, paMcakale\-gaLu muMtAduvanunx tananxlilx aDagisi\-koMDidudx saqSiTxya kAyaRgaLige kAraNavenisidudu I mahA\-liMga; savaRshUnayx sithxtiya vikAsadalilx shUnayxliMga niSakxlaliMga pada, mahAliMga eMba sithxtigaLalilx oMdu:}
\ullekha{aKaMDAdavxya nitayxniravaya paripUNaR sacicxdAnaMdavapapx niSakxlaliMgavu tAnu niSakxlanAgi niravayadalilx bayaluganAgi irabAradeMdu dhAyxna pUjegaLilalxde irabAradeMdu, tananx savxicACxliVlA\-vilAsadoV{\ri} neneva nenahu mAtarxdalilxyeV tananx\break citapxrXBAsAmathayxR shakitxya muMdugoMDu aKaMDateVjoV\-mUtiRyapapx mahAliMgavAyitutx (liMgaliV. 11-5); paragUDhavA shariVrasathx liMgakeSxVtarx urutarAnAdiyiVshavxra teVja\-viMteYdu pariya saMjecnxyanuLuLxdA mahAliMgaveY (viVsheYpu. 1-8-14); parashivaM citatxde parxvaqtitxyaM neneyalaMdurutarada citetx cicaCxkitxyAyatxda{\ri}Mde varamahAliMgavAyutx (cebapu.\break 60-36).}
\artha{AcAraliMga, guruliMga, shivaliMga, jaMgama\-liMga, parxsAdaliMga matutx mahAliMga eMba Aruvidhada liMgagaLalilx oMdu; I SaDivxdhaliMga\-gaLu anukarxmavAgi Bakatx,\break maheVsha, parxsAdi, pArxNaliMgi, sharaNa matutx aikayx eMba SaTasxthXla\-gaLoDane saMbaMdhisidudx, aikayxnalilx mahAliMgavu nelasu\-tatxde. manuSayxna kirxyegaLige kAraNavAda citatx, budidhx,\break ahaMkAra, mana, \hbox{jAcnxna} matutx BAva eMbuvugaLige anukarxmavAgi SaDivxdhaliMga\-gaLu saMbaMdhapaDutatxve:}
\ullekha{AcAra\-liMgaviDidu guru\-liMgava kANabeVku ...parxsAdaliMgaviDidu mahAliMgava kANabeVku (savasaM. 2; alalxma. 867-255); aikayxneMba aMgakekx mahAliMga BAvave hasatx haqdayaveV muKa samarasaveV Bakitx \hbox{cicaCxkitx} taqpitxye apiRta pariNAmaveV parxsAda (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 966-309); BAvaliMgadoLA mahA\-liMgamaM parxsAdAviraLaliMgavA pArxNaliMgadoLu shoVBAvahadoLeseva jaMgamaliMga shivaliMgaveseviSaTxliMgadalilx\break shirxVvimala guruliMgavAcAra\-liMgavA\char'273Y vicArisalu liMgasathxla\-vadoMdeyAyutx (viVsheYpu. 8-123-17); AgaLogedudu mahAliMgadiM GanaravaM rAga\-diMdidaR saBe naDugutatxmire karaM\break (nUpura. 55-2); shivasAthxnaMgaLaM noVDalu bijayaMge\-yuvxdeMdu tAnedudx keYgoTuTx naDedu palavuM mahAliMgaMgaLaM BaradiM toV{\ru}tatxM bapApx\-gaLu (nUpura. 257-4).}
\artha{pUjegAgi parxtiSAThxpisalapxTaTx shivaliMga; sAthxvaraliMga; ``mahA\-liMgada sAthxnaM\-gaLu -sAthxvaraliMgavu nelegoMDiruvaMtha keSxVtarxM\-gaLu'':}

\newmeaning{\artha{yAvudu sakalaranUnx kADutatxdeyoV adeV mAye:} \ullekha{``muMdugeDisitutx mAye'' (savasaM. 1; basava. 14-71) ``idAva pariyalilx kADitu
 mAye'' (savasaM. 1; basava. 15-7)} \artha{Ase; ``manada muMdaNa AseyeV mAye'' eMbalilx idu sapxSaTxvAgutatxde. pArxyashaH
 `aniyaMtirxta Ase' eMbudu adara oLAthaRvirabahudu.} \artha{marevu athavA ajAcnxna (avideyx) eMbudu matotxMdu. (noVDi: mAyAkAvaLa, mAyACAye):} \ullekha{sidadhxrAmanu ivelalxvanUnx\break tAtapxyaRrUpadalilx ``yoVgige  koVpaveV mAye, roVgige \hbox{apathayxveV} mAye, jAcnxnige mithayxveV mAye;
 arideneMbuvaMge nAnu niVneMbude mAye'' (savaaM. 4; sidadhxrA. 957-268); aMdhamoVha; meYmarevu; visamxqqti: aDaviya hogisitutx huDukuniVraladidxtutx ...I beDagina mAyeya baDihAri(?) samayigaLa nuDige nAcuvenu (savasaM. 6; aMbiga. 26-10); beVDa beVDa BoVgadoDanATa ...keVDu kaDeyoLihudadu mAyeya \hbox{keYyATa} (keYvapa. 50-1 palalxvi).}
\artha{mAyApaMcaka\-gaLalilx oMdu; Barxme; BArxMti:}
\ullekha{jagadUrxpa\-mAda anayxthA\-toVkeRge kAraNamapupxda{\ri}M mAyeyenisuvudu (viveVka. 30).}
\artha{sakala jiVvarAshigaLanunx hurupugoLisuva paMcashakitxgaLalilx oMdAda parAshakitxyalilxruva biMdu, kuMDalini matutx mAye eMba\break mUru parxkAragaLalilx oMdu:}
\ullekha{hiraNayxgaBaRdiMdaM ...paMcashakitx\-gaLogedavu AyA sushakitx\-gaLu savaRjiVvaperxVrakAyatatxvAgihavu pUvoRVkatx pareye mU\char'273\char'304\char'301yadhika biMdu kuMDalini mAyegaLenutatx (viVsheYpu. 7-98-22).}
\artha{tirxvidha tatatxvXgaLalilx oMdAda pAshada aidu viBAgagaLalilx oMdu:}
\ullekha{A pAshaveV mala mAye kamaR biMdu tiroVdhAnaveMdu paMcavidhavahudu (viveVka. 138).}
\artha{pati, kuMDalini, mAye, pashu, pAsha matutx diVkeSxyeMba SaTapxdAthaRgaLalilx oMdu:}
\ullekha{I sakalAgamaMgaLalilxyU ...pati kuMDalini mAye pashu pAsha diVkeSxyeMba SaTapxdAthaRM\-gaLu ...parxtipAdayxMgaLakukxM (viveVka. 67).}
\artha{pAvaRtiya tAmasakeya oMdu rUpa; mAyeyu adhoVmAye matutx UdhavxRmAye eMdu eraDu bageyAgide. I eraDu pada\-gaLu kalAshakitx matutx Bakitxshakitx eMba padagaLige payARya padagaLAgive.}}
